, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>THIS IS KOSHER KANGAROO COURT JUSTICE FOR YOU</b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/baUWKMu_h_8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/baUWKMu_h_8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Dra\u017een Erdemovi\u0107 is an\nethnic Bosnian Croat <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>HE IS NOT A SERB<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erdemovic was a member\nof a Bosnian Serb military unit, the \u201c10th Sabotage Unit,\u201d an eight-man team of\nwhich he claimed shot to death 1,200 Bosnian Muslim prisoners at Branjevo Farm\nnorth of Srebrenica in Bosnia on July 16, 1995. Erdemovic confessed to having\npersonally killed more than 100&nbsp;\nprisoners\u2014later he started saying 70 to 100 prisoners<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">Erdemovic served in the\n10th Sabotage Unit were clearly mercenaries, and after the ending of the Balkan\nwars served the French in Africa.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nErdemovic himself had worked for a time with the Bosnian Muslim army,\nthen with the Croatians, and then with the Bosnian Serbs.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The ICTY judges\nbelieved him, never saw him as a mercenary sans character and conscience despite\nhis performing military service for all three parties in the Bosnian warfare,\nand the ICTY took pains to exclude any witnesses from testifying who would put\nhim in a bad light.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Drazen Erdemovic, one\nof six Croatians along with a Muslim and a Slovene in an eight man mercenary\nunit which had become loosely attached to the Bosnian Serb Army</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drazen Erdemovic was\narrested on 2 March 1996 by the authorities of the Federal Republic of\nYugoslavia (FRY). He was transferred to the International Criminal Tribunal for\nthe former Yugoslavia (ICTY) on 30 March 1996.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Colonel Salpura, a\ndefence witness gave clear evidence that the killer team was on holiday leave\non July 16, 1995; Dragan Todorovic, a witness for the prosecution in the\nPopovic case and officer of the Drina Corp of the Bosnian Serb army, also\ntestified that the killer unit was on leave, that Lieutenant Kos, not private\nGojkovic, signed out for the arms to be used by the unit, and that Erdemovic\nvolunteered to be a member of that unit, and was not coerced into joining it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bribed prosecutors\nand judges were able to keep out of the court record the fact that the\nErdemovic unit that went to the Branjevo Farm did so during a ten-day vacation\nleave, not during regular service hours.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They also successfully buried the fact\nthat, according to an early interview with Erdemovic, he claimed that his\ncolleagues received a large sum of gold, of 12 kilos, for some kind of service\nrendered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This payment, which\nsuggests mercenary service, and not salary local currency payment by the\nBosnian Serb army, was never explored by prosecutors or judges in any of the\ntrials in which Erdemovic participated, and was only raised by Milosevic, who\nwas harshly limited in his questioning by Judge Richard May.&nbsp; &nbsp;Same\nhappened with Saddam Hussein before he was hung.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The facts that members\nof the killing group were on leave on July 16, 1995, and later findings of a\nFrench secret service connection of Pelemis and several of his colleagues, and\nthe subsequent recruitment of soldiers from the 10th Sabotage Unit for\nmercenary service in Zaire to fight in the war there on the side of Mobutu, are\nsuggestive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So is the fact that this mass murder of prisoners was extremely\nunhelpful to the Bosnian Serb cause, but worked out very well for the NATO\npowers. And it is clear why the ICTY, in service to NATO, would refuse to explore\nthese questions and linkages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Germinal Civikov points\nout that killing 1,200 people in five hours, ten at a batch, as claimed by\nErdemovic, would allow under three minutes for each batch, including getting\nthem out of the buses, taking them to the shooting zone, shooting them, making\nsure of their being dead, and disposing of the bodies..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why did the\nprosecutors, judges and media never address this issue of timing?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why did the\nprosecutor sometimes speak of only \u201chundreds\u201d killed at the Branjevo Farm?\nCould it be related to the fact that fewer than 200 bodies were recovered from\nthe site, and no aerial photos were ever produced that showed body removal or\nreburial?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drazen baby regularly\nclaimed before the Tribunal that he was a good man, hated war, was coerced into\nparticipating in the Branjevo Farm mass murder, and confessed to his crimes\nthere because he was a man of HAJAAAR conscience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erdemovic\u2019s account of\nthe executions, including the number of victims, is physically impossible.\nErdemovic claimed that that his small unit killed 1200 men in five hours by\nlining up ten men at a time and having them shot.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, to do so, his small unit\nof eight soldiers would have had only 2.5 minutes to line up ten men and\nexecute them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>If it took only 10 minutes to assemble and execute 10 prisoners,\nit would have taken 20 hours to kill 1200 men in the EFFICIENT manner that\nErdemovic claimed..&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were also claimed interludes of drinking, arguing,\nand cavorting. Why did the prosecutors, judges and media never address this\nissue of timing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most\nremarkable and revealing features of the Erdemovic case is that although he\nnamed seven individuals who did the killing with him, and two superiors in the\nchain of command who ordered or failed to stop the crime, not one of these was\never brought into an ICTY court either as an accused killer or to confirm any\nof Erdemovic\u2019s claims.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These co-killers have lived quietly, within easy reach\nof ICTY jurisdiction, but untroubled by that institution and any demands\nseemingly imposed by a rule of law.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The commander of his unit, a JEW named\nMilorad Pelemis, who Erdemovic claimed had given the order to kill, made it\nclear in an interview published in a Belgrade newspaper in November 2005, that\nthe Hague investigators have never questioned him. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erdemovic LIED that\nafter Milorad Pelemis came to power in his unit,&nbsp; Pelemis degraded him from the position of a\nsergeant to a soldier because he refused to carry out an order that could in\nhis opinion risk the lives of Muslim civilians ( A LIE ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On July 16th 1995 they\nwere sent to a farm in Pilica, Srebrenica, where they received the order to\nshoot the Muslim civilians. When Erdemovi\u0107 tried to disobey the order,&nbsp; Pelemis gave him a choice \u2013 Erdemovi\u0107 could\neither shoot the unarmed, innocent men or stand in line with them and get\nhimself and his family killed ( A LIE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same afternoonhe\nwas told to kill 500 other Muslim civilians in a school in Pilica.&nbsp; This time he disobeyed and gotaway with it. (\nA LIE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As these seven were\nkillers of many hundreds in Erdemovic\u2019s version, and the prosecutors and judges\ntook Erdemovic\u2019s version as true, why were these killers left untouched?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ignoring the co-perpetrators in this case strongly suggests that the\nprosecutors and judges were engaged in a political project\u2014protecting a witness\nwho would say what the ICTY wanted said, and refusing to allow any contesting\nevidence or cross-examination that would discredit the star witness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2004, a\nBosnian Croat, Marko Boskic, was arrested in Peabody, Massachusetts, for having\ncaused a hit-and-run car crash while drunk.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was soon discovered that Boskic\nwas one of the members of Erdemovic\u2019s killer team at Branjevo Farm. But\njournalists at the ICTY soon discovered that the Tribunal did not intend to ask\nfor the extradition of this accused and confessed murderer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A spokesman for the\nOffice of the Prosecutor stated on August 2004 that the prosecutor was not\napplying for the extradition of Boskic because it was obligated to concentrate\non \u201cthe big fish.\u201d So killing hundreds, and being part of a \u201cjoint criminal\nenterprise\u201d murdering 1,200, does not yield big enough fish for the ICTY. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another remarkable\nfeature of the handling of Erdemovic is his use as a star witness immediately\nafter he had been declared mentally impaired and before his own sentencing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following his first confession of guilt on May 31, 1996, on June 27, 1996\nErdemovic was declared by his trial judges to be unfit for questioning in his\nown sentencing hearing because psychiatrists found him to be suffering from\npost-traumatic stress disorder, the doctors urging a pre-hearing review of his mental\ncondition in six to nine months time.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But on July 5th, little more than a week\nafter this medical report, Erdemovic was put forward as the star witness in a\npre-trial hearing to publicize the current allegations against Radovan Karadzic\nand Ratko Mladic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was a remarkable\nspectacle. The two accused had not been apprehended, so they were not present\nto defend themselves, nor were their attorneys.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was only the prosecutors and\nICTY judges in action. The same judges who had just declared him mentally unfit\nfor questioning in his own hearing now pushed him forward without any further\nmedical examination.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was mainly on the basis of unverified and unchallenged\n(and unchallengeable) testimony of this sick man and mass killer still facing\nhis own trial and sentencing, that arrest warrants were issued for Karadzic and\nMladic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drazen baby agreed to\ntestify for the ICTY\u2014he had expected complete immunity, as he told Le Figaro\nreporter Renaud Girard (\u201cBosnia: Confession of a War Criminal, \u201c Le Figaro,\nMarch 8, 1996).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He claimed to have an agreement with the ICTY whereby \u201cin\nreturn for his evidence he will be allowed to settle in a Western country with\nhis family. He will enter the box as a witness, not as an accused, and will\nthus escape all punishment.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 29 November 1996, Drazen\nbaby was sentenced to 10 years imprisonment for war crimes and crimes against\nhumanity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 26 August 1998\nDrazen Erdenovic was transferred to Norway to serve the remainder of his\nsentence. On the basis of the credit given for the time served in detention\nsince 28 March 1996, he was granted early release on 13 August 1999\u2014after 32\nmonths .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only person\nactually convicted of killing anyone is Drazen Erdemovic, a LYING CRIMINAL Croat\nserving in a mercenary outfit that fought for the Bosnian Serbs.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drazen baby ended up\nafter his prison term in an unknown location as a \u201cprotected witness\u201d of the\nICTY. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Since 2000 he lives\nwith a new, \"protected\" identity in a West European country</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like how Rothschild\u2019s media tells lies about\nDonald Trump quoting SOURCES\u2014( lies )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Same way&nbsp;\n\u201ctrial by press\u201d procedure allowed prosecutors to bring up all manner of\nundocumented allegations against Karadzic and Mladic without any rebuttal from\ndefense lawyers, in order to exert public pressure for the arrest of the\nBosnian Serb leaders.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Though\nhe had admitted to taking part in serious crimes, Erdemovic received the short\nsentence of a few months <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">His earlier arrest, indictment and publicity\nin Yugoslavia was all about preserving&nbsp;\nICTY\u2019s credibility . He ended up after his prison term in an unknown\nlocation as a \u201cprotected witness\u201d of the ICTY. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">But even before his own sentencing he had\nbegun his role as star witness in the ICTY\u2019s (and U.S. and NATO\u2019s) trials of\naccused Serbs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">He appeared in five such trials, and from\nbeginning to end was taken as a truth-teller by prosecutors, judges, and the\nmainstream media.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/uDfsAxvIMyc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/uDfsAxvIMyc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Was Bosnian Serb\nPresident Radovan Karadzic a \u201cmastermind\u201d of the carnage following the capture\nof Srebrenica in July of 1995?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The comprehensive 2002 Dutch government report\non Srebrenica, whose authors had access to all relevant intelligence documents\n\u2014 American, Serbian, Bosnian Muslim, German, Dutch \u2014 produced a wealth of\ninformation, but none linking Karadzic to atrocities following the capture of\nSrebrenica.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operation Storm was the\nlast major battle of the Croatian War of Independence and a major factor in the\noutcome of the Bosnian War. It was a decisive victory for the Croatian Army\n(HV), which attacked across a 630-kilometre front against the Republic of\nSerbian Krajina (RSK), and a strategic victory for the Army of the Republic of\nBosnia and Herzegovina <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operation Storm\ncommenced at dawn on 4 August 1995 and was declared complete on the evening of\n7 August<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number of Serb\ncivilian deaths is 1,192 civilians killed or missing. During and after the\noffensive, 200,000 Serbs\u2014or nearly the entire Serb population of the area\nformerly held by the ARSK\u2014fled and a variety of crimes were committed against\nthe remaining civilians there.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The International Criminal Tribunal for the\nFormer Yugoslavia (ICTY) later tried three Croatian generals charged with war\ncrimes and partaking in a joint criminal enterprise designed to force the Serb\npopulation out of Croatia, although all three were ultimately acquitted and the\ntribunal refuted charges of a criminal enterprise.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2010, Serbia sued Croatia\nbefore the International Court of Justice (ICJ), claiming that the offensive\nwas an example of genocide.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2015, the court ruled that it was not genocidal,\nand it affirmed that the Serb population fled as a direct result of the\noffensive, although Croatia did not have the specific intent to displace the\ncountry's Serb minority, nor was it found that ethnic cleansing or civilian\ntargeting took place.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yugoslavia became a\nSocialist state after World War Two. It consisted of six republics:\nBosnia-Herzegovina, Croatia, Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia and Slovenia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The federation began\nfalling apart in the early 1990s. Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia and Macedonia\ndeclared independence, sparking conflicts with the Serb-dominated Yugoslav\narmy. All four countries were eventually recognised as independent by the UN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2006, Montenegro\nalso emerged as a sovereign state after a referendum for independence, ending\nthe former Union of Serbia and Montenegro. Croatian army launched Operation\nStorm to take control of the Serbian-occupied territory in Croatia.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operation\nStorm lasted nearly 84 hours. The Croatian army faced little resistance when it\ntook control of the Serb territory. Now, Croatia celebrates the 20th\nanniversary of the victory with parades - one in Knin and a giant one - by the\ncountry's standards - in its capital, Zagreb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It no longer seems to\nmatter that \"Oluja\" forced 200,000 Serbs to flee from the advancing\nCroatian army and for the most part, never to return. Several international\ncourts consider this to be ethnic cleansing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Croatia today,\nbarely anyone mentions the retaliatory attacks on those who did not flee. In\nthe years after the war in Croatia, the ruling elite have constantly tried to\nreinforce the idea that Operation Storm was liberating.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The other side of this\noperation was ignored, meaning the ethnic cleansing and the blatant intention\nof then president Franjo Tudjman to reduce the number of Serbs living in\nCroatia to fewer than three percent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The UN-backed court\u2019s\nappeals chamber ruled that the shelling of the four towns was not\nindiscriminate, no crime of deportation could be proved and there was no \u2018joint\ncriminal enterprise\u2019 aimed at expelling Serbs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A \"victory\"\nover fleeing civilians and deserted towns and villages, while twenty years\nlater much of the \"liberated\" country continues to be economically\nneglected by those in power in Zagreb. Completely symptomatic of a small\ncountry led by elites with an identity crisis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Operation Storm\u2019 in\nAugust 1995, when Croatia overran the Serb-inhabited territory of Krajina, was\nthe biggest single instance of ethnic cleansing in the Yugoslav Wars, Because\nthe attack was backed by the US, however, it was never treated as a crime.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No \u201cinvaders,\u201d these\nSerbs had lived in the Krajina \u2013 their word for borderlands \u2013 for centuries.\nThe 1995 onslaught was not just a final phase of the war that began in 1991,\nbut a continuation of the 1940s Nazi atrocities, and a long, sordid history of\noppression and betrayal going back to the 1800s.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the late 1600s, the\nHapsburg Empire (later Austria-Hungary) established a buffer zone along the\nborder with the Ottoman Turks. in exchange for military service, the Orthodox\nSerb frontiersmen were granted religious liberties by the Catholic Hapsburgs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the 1800s, the Ottomans were in retreat and Austria became obsessed with\nsubjugating the Serbs and trying to subsume them into the Catholic Croat\npopulation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Austria-Hungary disintegrated in 1918, the Croats chose to\njoin the Serbs in a new South Slav kingdom \u2013 Yugoslavia \u2013 rather than be\npartitioned between Hungary, Austria and Italy. In April 1941, as Yugoslavia\nwas invaded by the Axis powers, Croatian Nazis known as \u201cUstasha\u201d declared an\nindependent state with the backing of Hitler and Mussolini. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Ustasha Croatia led\nby crypto Jew Ante Pavelic conducted a campaign of mass murder, expulsion and\nforced conversion of Serbs to Catholicism, which outright disgusted the\nItalians and made even some Germans recoil in horror.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A Croatian legion was\nsent to the Eastern Front, where it perished under Stalingrad. When the\nCommunist regime of Marshal Tito took over Yugoslavia in 1945, however,\nCroatian atrocities were hushed up for the sake of \u201cbrotherhood and unity.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The end of Communism in\n1990 saw a revival of Nazi symbols and vocabulary in Croatia. President Franjo\nTudjman denied Ustasha atrocities and expressed joy his wife was \u201cneither Serb\nnor Jewish.\u201d Serbs were stripped of equal citizenship and declared a minority.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Tudjman declared independence in June 1991, the Serbs saw 1941 all over\nagain. They took up arms and declared the Krajina Republic \u2013 not denying the\nCroats their right to independence, but disputing Zagreb's claim to lands\nCroatia acquired under the same Yugoslavia it now sought to leave.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the disintegrating\nYugoslav Army backed the Krajina Serbs, Zagreb cried \u201cSerbian aggression.\u201d\nInternational pressure and UN sanctions sought to cut off Belgrade\u2019s support\nfor the rebels. When Tudjman failed to crush the Serb resistance, an armistice\nwas arranged in January 1992. Krajina was placed under the protection of UN\npeacekeepers, dubbed UNPROFOR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, the Clinton\nadministration began backing Croatia and the Bosnian Muslims in their war\nagainst the local Serbs. In 1994, MPRI \u2013 a private company staffed with retired\nUS military officers \u2013 was paid to train and equip the Croatian military.\nOfficially, of course, they were teaching them democracy and human rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In May 1995, Croatia\nlaunched a strike on the Serb enclave of Western Slavonia. The UN did nothing,\nwhile the Western media was firmly focused on Bosnia. Everything was ready for\nthe main event, dubbed \u201cOperation Storm.\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It began on August 4, with a predawn\nartillery barrage and the assault by 200,000 Croatian troops, trained by MPRI\nand armed with surplus Warsaw Pact weapons procured from eager Eastern European\naspirants to NATO membership.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Three days later, most\nof Krajina\u2019s Serbs had been expelled from their homes, while more than 2,000\nwere dead. Churches, cemeteries and entire villages were razed to the ground,\nwhile refugee columns were strafed by fighter jets.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most propaganda about\nthe Bosnian War relied on allegations of Serb aggression and genocide. All of\nthem have, by now, been exposed as lies. &nbsp;Only Srebrenica remains, due to its elevation\ninto a blanket excuse for Western \u201chumanitarian\u201d ( read as American\nexceptionalism ) &nbsp;warfare worldwide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://theremustbejustice.wordpress.com/2014/01/23/sensational-confession-of-ibran-mustafic-bosnian-muslim-war-veteran-and-politician-we-were-killing-our-own-people-in-srebrenica-srebrenica/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://theremustbejustice.wordpress.com/2014/01/23/sensational-confession-of-ibran-mustafic-bosnian-muslim-war-veteran-and-politician-we-were-killing-our-own-people-in-srebrenica-srebrenica/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">https://theremustbejustice.wordpress.com/2013/04/26/srebrenica-as-an-conclusive-proof-of-the-western-moral-obligation-to-intervene-militarily-worldwide/</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">INDIA WILL BE A SUPER POWER IN 16 YEARS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WAR CRIMINALS AND THEIR POODLES WILL BE\nBROUGHT TO JUSTICE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">TILL THEN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WATCH THIS SPACE-&nbsp; YOU CUNTS &nbsp;!</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His accent was Russian.\nHe came to the limelight out of nowhere in Oct 1936 \u2013planted by Jew Rothschild.&nbsp; Told to me by my colleague Russian captain\nwhose father was in KGB.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tito made regular\ngrammatical errors and used malapropisms that normal Croats wouldn\u2019t say. &nbsp;The imposter shortie Tito could play the piano\n, while the REAL tall Tito with only 4 fingers on left hand ( pinky finger\nmissing ) &nbsp;, could not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man named Marijan\nJohn Markul&nbsp; who was in the same prison\ncell with the REAL Tito knew that Tito was an imposter \u2013as he could not recognize\nhim<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE FIRST US PRESIDENT GEORGE WASHINGTON WAS A GERMAN JEW\nADAM WEISHAUPT , PLANTED BY ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THROW\n4/1000 &nbsp;INITIATIVE ON THE FACE OF JEW\nROTHSCHILD AND BILDERBERG CLUB, &nbsp; WHEN YOU TEAR AND THROW PARIS COP21<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TELLING\nALL THIS TO OUR ( SLAVE TO JEWS ) PATHETIC APCO BRANDED &nbsp;PM NARENDRA &nbsp;DAMODARDAS &nbsp;MODI &nbsp;IS NO USE..<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TTDA-k9fG5Y/WRwWVbyGJMI/AAAAAAABTaQ/7X9eqzXUS3QQc0gMzgZr5bHaG_hvfW8kgCLcB/s1600/4%2BpeSSr%2B1000_0.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TTDA-k9fG5Y/WRwWVbyGJMI/AAAAAAABTaQ/7X9eqzXUS3QQc0gMzgZr5bHaG_hvfW8kgCLcB/s1600/4%2BpeSSr%2B1000_0.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">French \u201c4 per 1000\nInitiative\u201d&nbsp; is a climate change strategy\nthat came out of the COP21 Paris Climate Talks.&nbsp;\nThe initiative has support from a wide array of&nbsp; kosher organizations, including IFOAM\nOrganics International, and the Organic Consumers Association (OCA). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 4/1000 Initiative\nproposes that by increasing soil carbon content by 0.04 percent each year for\nthe next 25 years, we can eliminate enough excess carbon from the atmosphere to\nprevent the Earth\u2019s temperature from rising higher than 2\u00b0C above\npre-industrial levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; The chemicals were used in many manufactured products, from electrical equipment and plastics to flooring and industrial products.<br />\n<br />\nInternal documents revealed Monsanto had full knowledge of the severity of the pollution problem<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oregonlive.com/environment/index.ssf/2017/01/port_of_portland_sues_monsanto.html<br />\n<br />\nFRACKING HAS MADE USA A GREAT NITRO FERTILIZER PRODUCING NATION<br />\n<br />\nThe reason for the cheap gas is fracking\u2014the process of extracting gas from rock formations by bombarding them with pressurized water spiked with toxic chemicals.<br />\n<br />\nBetween 2005 and 2010, U.S. growers of genetically engineered corn, largely for GMO animal feed and ethanol, increased their nitrogen fertilizer in a mindless manner<br />\n<br />\n72% of the U.S. drinking water supply is contaminated at high levels with carcinogenic nitrates or nitrites, almost all from excessive use of synthetic nitrogen fertilizer.<br />\n<br />\nNitrogen fertilizer is also the greatest contributor to the infamous dead zones in the Gulf of Mexico, the Chesapeake Bay, the coasts of California and Oregon<br />\n<br />\nSince very little synthetic nitrogen fertilizer was used before 1950, all of the damage we see today occurred in the last 65 years.<br />\n<br />\nIn combination with herbicide residues such as Syngenta\u2019s atrazine, nitrates become even more toxic, potentially causing brain damage and hormone disruption.<br />\n<br />\nIn some rural areas, fertilizer pollution levels are 15 times beyond so-called \u201callowable levels\u201d<br />\n<br />\nUSA USES EXCESSIVE NITRATE FERTILSERS IN GOLD COURSES<br />\n<br />\nAnhydrous ammonia, a nitrogen compound compressed into a clear, colorless liquid for easy application, is extremely dangerous to workers and neighboring communities.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to GMO no-till advocates, adding nitrogen fertilizer to soil, is supposedly \u201cclimate friendly\u201d because it allegedly helps crops draw CO2 from the atmosphere and sequester it in the soil as organic carbon.<br />\n<br />\nNO TILL<br />\n<br />\nNO TILL<br />\n<br />\nNO TILL<br The loss of soil carbon has many adverse consequences for productivity, one of which is to decrease water storage. There are also adverse implications for air and water quality, since carbon dioxide will be released into the air, while excessive nitrogen contributes to the nitrate pollution problem<br />\n<br />\nMuch of the organic carbon decline occurred in the fertilized soil found in corn belts.<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide is responsible for approximate 11 percent of all U.S. greenhouse gas emissions from human activities<br />\n<br />\nThe primary cause of N2O contamination of the atmosphere are the nitrogen fertilizers used in industrial (non-organic) agriculture.<br />\n<br />\nFew people understand that the worst U.S. greenhouse gas emitter is \u201cFood Incorporated,\u201d industrial food and farming<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">PARIS COP21 DID NOT ADDRESS METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE<br /><br />WE ASK PM MODI-- HEY GUJJU NO 2-- DO YOU WORK FOR BHARATMATA OR JEW ROTHSCHILD?</span></b><br />\nIndustrial food and farming accounts for a huge portion of U.S. greenhouse gas emissions. EPA\u2019s ridiculously low estimates was just 7% when in reality is it more than 61 %.<br />\n<br />\nIndustrial food and farming ( chemical fertiliser agriculture ) destroys the natural capacity of plants and soils to sequester atmospheric carbon.<br />\n<br />\nTHE BEEF INDUSTRY LOBBY BRIBES EVERYBODY<br />\n<br />\nMore than 86% of U.S. agriculture is devoted to producing factory-farmed meat, dairy and animal feed.<br />\n<br />\nThe most climate-damaging greenhouse gas poison used by industrial farmers is synthetic nitrogen fertilizer. Pesticide manufacture and use are also serious problems, which generate their own large share of GHGs during manufacture and use<br />\n<br />\nBy the 1990s, more than 92 percent of nitrogen fertilizer used in the U.S. was synthetic.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I WROTE A POST BELOW ONLY FOR ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED PM MODI<br /><br />THIS PATHETIC GUJARATI FELLOW IGNORED IT.. The process by\nwhich carbon sinks remove carbon dioxide (CO2) from the atmosphere is known as\ncarbon sequestration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Absorption of carbon\ndioxide by the oceans via physicochemical and biological processes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WARM BEER EJECTS\nTHE FIZZ AND THEN AFTER 5 MINUTES YOU FEEL AS IF THE BAR HAS GIVEN YOU FLAT\nBEER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OCEANS HOLD CARBON DI\nOXIDE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WARM OCEAN DURING AN\nEL NINO YEAR LIKE 2015 SPEWS CO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ZIONIST WEST WANTS\nINDIA TO BUILD COAL PLANTS WHICH EMITS ZERO CO2.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL HUMAN BEINGS AND\nTREES ( FLORA AND FAUNA ) EMIT CO2--THIS IS NATUREs WAY .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">they are trying to fool\nus with NAYIRAH shit termed CCS technology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CCS is done in three\nmain steps-- to carbon capture and storage (CCS) -- trapping and separating the\nCO2 from other gases, transporting this captured CO2 to a storage location, and\nstoring that CO2 far away from the atmosphere (underground or deep in the\nocean). </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS COSTS MONEY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MIGHT AS WELL GENERATE\nELECTRICITY BY BURNING PETROL IN GENERATORS--IT WILL WORK OUT MANY TIMES\nCHEAPER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY HAS MODI CHOSEN\nCHITPAVAN PRAKASH JAVDEKAR AS THE ENVIRONMENTAL MINISTER .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>QUOTE:&nbsp;&nbsp; ONLY A MAD MAN-- NAY -- A CHOOT WILL INJECT\nCO2 FROM COAL POWER PLANT EXHAUST INTO THE OCEAN BY SPENDING MONEY IN A\nEXTRAVAGANT MANNER . UNQUOTE </b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>QUOTE:&nbsp; India will NOT be fooled by the Zionist Jews\nwho want us to extract CO2 from coal power plant flue gas and inject into the\nground / deep sea using SUPER EXPENSIVE and bullshit CCS technology --. Carbon\ncapture and storage if you pleaJJE.&nbsp; UNQUOTE\n</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_9.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust_9.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_JF9F_OVT80/WRxTxq3A3CI/AAAAAAABTa4/CIKDb7OVPusmvHjezWTy3eifHkMl8DRCwCLcB/s1600/1W_2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_JF9F_OVT80/WRxTxq3A3CI/AAAAAAABTa4/CIKDb7OVPusmvHjezWTy3eifHkMl8DRCwCLcB/s640/1W_2.jpg\" width=\"536\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount of carbon on\nthe earth and in Earth's atmosphere is fixed, but that fixed amount of carbon\nis dynamic, always changing into different carbon compounds and moving between\nliving and nonliving things.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon is released to the atmosphere from what are\ncalled \"carbon sources\" and stored in plants, animals, rocks, and\nwater in what are called \"carbon sinks.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This process occurs in a\nnumber of steps. In the first step, through photosynthesis (the process by\nwhich plants capture the sun's energy and use it to grow), plants take carbon\ndioxide out of the atmosphere and release oxygen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The carbon dioxide is\nconverted into carbon compounds that make up the body of the plant, which are\nstored in both the aboveground parts of the plants (shoots and leaves), and the\nbelowground parts (roots). In the next step, animals eat the plants, breath in\nthe oxygen, and exhale carbon dioxide.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The carbon dioxide created by animals is\nthen available for plants to use in photosynthesis. Carbon stored in plants\nthat are not eaten by animals eventually decomposes after the plants die, and\nis either released into the atmosphere or stored in the soil.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One\nimportant aspect of the carbon cycle is the speed with which carbon moves from\na carbon source to a carbon sink and then back again. Some living things grow\nand decompose more quickly than others.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rate of decomposition, and the\nresulting release of carbon, can be hastened by the actions of specialized\nmicroscopic and macroscopic plants and animals, called \"decomposers,\"\nthat break down plant and animal matter. The decomposition process ends up\ncreating carbon dioxide and other gases, such as methane.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Plant and animal\ngrowth and decomposition occur simultaneously, all the time. We see live trees\ngrowing, and leaf litter and downed trees rotting in the same forest, for\nexample.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While a portion of the\ntotal amount of carbon present on the earth runs through the carbon cycle\nrelatively quickly, transitioning from atmospheric carbon dioxide to plant and\nanimal matter, and back into atmospheric carbon dioxide within hundreds of\nyears, another portion of the carbon is caught up in long-lived and stable\ncarbon sinks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Absent carbon and\ncritical microbes, soil becomes mere dirt, a process of deterioration that\u2019s\nbeen rampant around the globe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon sequestration is\nthe process involved in carbon capture and the long-term storage of atmospheric\ncarbon dioxide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All crops absorb CO2\nduring growth and release it after harvest. The goal of agricultural carbon\nremoval is to use the crop and its relation to the carbon cycle to permanently\nsequester carbon within the soil.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is done by selecting farming methods\nthat return biomass to the soil and enhance the conditions in which the carbon\nwithin the plants will be reduced to its elemental nature and stored in a\nstable state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">THIS WAS THE ESSENCE OF ANCIENT INDIAN ORGANIC AGRICULTURE.&nbsp; &nbsp;ANCIENT INDIANS WERE THE FIRST ON THE PLANET\nTO DO CROP ROTATION .</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary way that\ncarbon is stored in the soil is as soil organic matter (SOM).
