text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHOULD YOU READ THE LIPS OF AN INDIAN BLOGGER ?</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>AND HULLO -- CUNTS AT ICE STATION HEMADRI -- HULLOOOOOOOO ?</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--h4JiMYSbRY/WRitHquQPwI/AAAAAAABTVs/gfrWgoDaO7YsB-kItoYlLlb4X6P5BFQsACLcB/s1600/green_pola33rbear%252C0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"496\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--h4JiMYSbRY/WRitHquQPwI/AAAAAAABTVs/gfrWgoDaO7YsB-kItoYlLlb4X6P5BFQsACLcB/s640/green_pola33rbear%252C0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.rcinet.ca/eye-on-the-arctic/2016/02/15/algae-related-toxins-found-in-arctic-sea-mammals/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.rcinet.ca/eye-on-the-arctic/2016/02/15/algae-related-toxins-found-in-arctic-sea-mammals/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/FktV9uEndqM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/FktV9uEndqM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen this planet\u2019s\noceans \u2013 I know the ocean currents .&nbsp;\nThere are more than 420 dead zones in the world\u2019s oceans where fish and\nother marine wildlife can not live. Their cause? Mostly synthetic nitrogen\nfertilizer and phosphorus runoff from farms and lawns. &nbsp;But hey, ugly Aussies are crying hoarse about\ntheir bullshit great fuckin\u2019 barrier reef&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These ARTIFICIAL fertilizers\nstimulate rapid growth of phytoplankton (\u201calgal blooms\u201d), which then use up all\nthe oxygen in the water, making it impossible for other organisms to breathe.</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fertilizers\nused in soil also leach nitrites into our drinking water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High concentrations of\nnitrates in our acidic stomachs form nitrosoamines, which are carcinogenic.\nThis means that people consuming these nitrates have an increased risk of\ndeveloping certain types of cancer.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrosamines are\nproduced when nitrites and amines combine in acidic places like the human stomach.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrites\nare added to some processed foods to increase the shelf life. For example,\nsodium nitrate is responsible for the pink colour in bologna.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">N</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">itrosamines\ncan play a part in Alzheimer's brain degeneration. &nbsp;It&nbsp; has\ndriven people into drug addiction . Punjab is an example.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrosamines in low,\nlimited exposure can also cause diabetes, fatty liver disease and obesity. They\nhave been linked to Parkinson\u2019s disease. Nitrosamines can cause DNA damage,\ncell death and have been associated with insulin resistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High nitrogen levels in\nplant tissue can decrease resistance and increase susceptibility to pest\nattacks. that the ability of a crop plant to resist or tolerate insect pests\nand diseases is tied to optimal physical, chemical and mainly biological\nproperties of soils. Soils with high organic matter and active soil biology\ngenerally exhibit good soil fertility.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crops grown in such soils generally\nexhibit lower abundance of several insect herbivores, reductions that may be\nattributed to a lower nitrogen content in organically farmed crops. On the\nother hand, farming practices, such as excessive use of inorganic fertilizers,\ncan cause nutrient imbalances and lower pest resistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Climate scientists have\nlong known that there was a sharp spike in N2O (nitrous oxide) emissions\ncorresponding with the increased synthetic nitrogen fertilizer usage of the\nGreen Revolution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The negative externalities of just one part of that\nsystem\u2013synthetic nitrogen fertilizer\u2013is compounding and accelerating the\ninterrelated problems of fossil fuel dependency, soil degradation, water pollution,\nhuman health, and global warming. Ignorance can no longer be used as an excuse\nfor continuing down this path.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic fertilizers\nstarve the microbes in a way and pesticides kill off beneficial organisms,\ncausing the need for a never-ending cycle of synthetic fertilizer and pesticide\napplication.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was a great if you owned stock in the large chemical\ncompanies, but bad when you understand the side effects including health issues\nfor animals and humans \u2013 especially farmers, because the chemicals get into\ndrinking water and food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since Green Revolution\nwas introduced in India grain, fruits and vegetables have dropped in\nnutritional value.. It\u2019s due to the missing micronutrients soil microbes used\nto pull from decomposing plant material and mineral soils.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use of artificial\nfertilisers have hardened the soil, decreased fertility, strengthened pesticides,\npolluted air and water, and released greenhouse gases, thereby bringing hazards\nto human health and environment as well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Continuous use of these\nchemical fertilizers&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">depletes essential soil\nnutrients and minerals that are naturally found&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">in fertile soil. When\nwe use chemical fertilizers; they do not help&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">replenish soil\nnutrients and its fertility contrary to the popular belief; but,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">replenish only\nnitrogen, potassium and phosphorous.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">And we know&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">phosphorous does not\ndissolve in water and its overuse will cause&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">hardening of soil. Likewise\nalkaline fertilizers like sodium-nitrate&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">develop alkalinity in\nsoil reducing its fertility and making it barren.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">So to&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">say; soil fertility and\nvegetation depend much on the balanced supply of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">essential nutrients and\nminerals. As such, overuse of specific nutrients&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">may cause imbalance in\nthe supply of soil nutrients further resulting in&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">soil degradation and\nthe loss of equilibrium of a stable soil.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though chemical\nfertilizers will help plants grow faster; plants will not be&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">healthy and strong as\nplants grown in that manner do not have enough&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">time to mature to\ndevelop a good root growth, strong stems, or&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">nutritious fruits and\nvegetables.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Even they will be less likely to survive&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">because they will be\nmore susceptible to pests and diseases as they lack&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">good immune system and\nenough resistance against these&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">forces.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Besides this,\nchemical fertilizers can cause root burn or fertilizer&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">burn, as chemical\nfertilizers do not allow enough water intake for the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">plants. As already\nsaid; chemical fertilizers are high in nitrogen salts, and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">when the nitrogen is\nabsorbed by soil too quickly; it will dehydrate and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">dry up the plant.. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Nitrogen fertilizers break down into&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">nitrates and travel\neasily through the soil. Because it is water-soluble and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">can remain in\ngroundwater for decades, the addition of more nitrogen&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">over the years has an\naccumulative effect.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, organic\nfertilizers are not like them; they are slow release which will&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">allow time for\nmicrobial activity to break down the organic materials in&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">the fertilizers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">When\nwe talk of microbial activity; we need to remember&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">that natural microbes;\nwhich include beneficial insects, fungus, and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">bacteria found in the\nsoil, are very much helpful for healthy soil and plant&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">growth. Needless to\nsay, use of chemical fertilizers will kill these soil&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">friendly\nmicro-organisms.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nearly all insecticides\nhave the potential to significantly alter ecosystems; many are toxic to humans;\nsome concentrate along the food chain.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THESE BASTARDS DO NOT SAY THAT ALL THIS PLASTIC ORIGINATED FROM THE SE COAST OF USA -- &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NR3RqMMIwD4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/NR3RqMMIwD4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ALL WERE SLAVES EXCEPT ANDREW JACKSON</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/richard-m-nixon-greatest-american.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/richard-m-nixon-greatest-american.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insecticides kill bees\nand is a cause of pollinator decline, the loss of bees that pollinate plants,\nand colony collapse disorder (CCD) in which worker bees from a beehive or\nWestern honey bee colony abruptly disappear.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nLoss of pollinators means a reduction in crop yields.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIAs BEES HAVE BEEN\nDECIMATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW KERALAs COMMIE GOVT\nWANT TO SPONSOR STINGLESS BEES WHICH PROVIDE SHIT HONEY.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE SHIT BEES CANT EVEN MAKE THEIR OWN BEE HIVES . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BEE HIVES ARE MADE BY SHABDA BRAHMAN ( BY\nSOUND )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/honey-quantum-food-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/honey-quantum-food-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>IN ANCIENT INDIA WE\nUSED HARMLESS ORGANIC FRAGRANCES TO KEEP PESTS AWAY.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insecticides can be\nclassified in two major groups: systemic insecticides, which have residual or\nlong term activity; and contact insecticides, which have no residual activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Furthermore, one can\ndistinguish three types of insecticide. 1. Natural insecticides, such as\nnicotine, pyrethrum and neem extracts, made by plants as defenses against\ninsects. 2. Inorganic insecticides, which are metals. 3. Organic insecticides,\nwhich are organic chemical compounds, mostly working by contact.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mode of action\ndescribes how the pesticide kills or inactivates a pest. It provides another\nway of classifying insecticides. Mode of action is important in understanding\nwhether an insecticide will be toxic to unrelated species, such as fish, birds\nand mammals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insecticides may be\nrepellent or non-repellent. Social insects such as ants cannot detect\nnon-repellents and readily crawl through them. As they return to the nest they\ntake insecticide with them and transfer it to their nestmates. Over time, this\neliminates all of the ants including the queen. This is slower than some other\nmethods, but usually completely eradicates the ant colony.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insecticides are\ndistinct from non-insecticidal repellents, which repel but do not kill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Systemic insecticides\nbecome incorporated and distributed systemically throughout the whole plant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When insects feed on the plant, they ingest the insecticide. Systemic\ninsecticides produced by transgenic plants are called plant-incorporated\nprotectants (PIPs). For instance, a gene that codes for a specific Bacillus\nthuringiensis biocidal protein was introduced into corn and other species. The\nplant manufactures the protein, which kills the insect when consumed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contact insecticides\nare toxic to insects upon direct contact. These can be inorganic insecticides,\nwhich are metals and include arsenates, copper and fluorine compounds, which\nare less commonly used, and the commonly used sulfur. Contact insecticides can\nbe organic insecticides, i.e. organic chemical compounds, synthetically\nproduced, and comprising the largest numbers of pesticides used today. Or they\ncan be natural compounds like pyrethrum, neem oil etc. Contact insecticides\nusually have no residual activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Efficacy can be related\nto the quality of pesticide application, with small droplets, such as aerosols\noften improving performance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many organic compounds\nare produced by plants for the purpose of defending the host plant from\npredation. A trivial case is tree rosin, which is a natural insecticide.\nSpecific, the production of oleoresin by conifer species is a component of the\ndefense response against insect attack and fungal pathogen infection<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organophosphates are\nanother large class of contact insecticides. These also target the insect's\nnervous system. Organophosphates interfere with the enzymes\nacetylcholinesterase and other cholinesterases, disrupting nerve impulses and\nkilling or disabling the insect. Organophosphate insecticides and chemical\nwarfare nerve agents (such as sarin, tabun, soman, and VX) work in the same\nway. Organophosphates have a cumulative toxic effect to wildlife, so multiple\nexposures to the chemicals amplifies the toxicity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some insecticides kill\nor harm other creatures in addition to those they are intended to kill. For\nexample, birds may be poisoned when they eat food that was recently sprayed\nwith insecticides or when they mistake an insecticide granule on the ground for\nfood and eat it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sprayed insecticide may\ndrift from the area to which it is applied and into wildlife areas, especially\nwhen it is sprayed aerially<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Studies on non-Hodgkin\nlymphoma and leukemia showed positive associations with pesticide exposure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negative outcomes from\npesticide exposure including neurological problems, birth defects, fetal death,\nand neurodevelopmental disorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to The\nStockholm Convention on Persistent Organic Pollutants, 9 of the 12 most\ndangerous and persistent chemicals are pesticides. Associations have been found\nwith: leukemia, lymphoma, brain, kidney, breast, prostate, pancreas, liver,\nlung, and skin cancers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The risk of developing\nParkinson's disease is 75 % greater in those exposed to even low levels of\npesticides. Long-term exposures increase the risk of dementia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pesticide exposure causes\nbirth defects, fetal death and altered fetal growth. In the United States,\nincrease in birth defects is associated with conceiving in the same period of\nthe year when agrochemicals are in elevated concentrations in surface water.\nAgent Orange, a 50:50 mixture of 2,4,5-T and 2,4-D, has been associated with\nbad health and genetic effects in Cambodia and Vietnam. It was also found that\noffspring that were at some point exposed to pesticides had a low birth weight\nand had developmental defects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">USA USED AGENT ORANGE IN\nVIETNAM AND CAMBODIA LIKE COCKROACH SPRAY TO KILL HUMANS AND TREES .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">BASTARDS !</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/and-winner-is-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/and-winner-is-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A number of pesticides\nincluding dibromochlorophane and 2,4-D has been associated with impaired\nfertility in males. Pesticide exposure resulted in reduced fertility in males,\ngenetic alterations in sperm, a reduced number of sperm, damage to germinal\nepithelium and altered hormone function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pesticide exposure is\nassociated with long-term health problems such as respiratory problems,\nincluding asthma, memory disorders and depression<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER , ALMOST ALL PEER\nREVIEWED STUDY ON PESTICIDES IS DONE BY THE SAME EVIL ZIONIST JEWS &nbsp;WHO MAKE THESE PESTICIDES&nbsp; ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to\nresearchers from the National Institutes of Health (NIH), licensed pesticide\napplicators who used chlorinated pesticides on more than 100 days in their\nlifetime were at greater risk of diabetes.&nbsp;\nThis has created a new diabetes called LADA. You don\u2019t have to spray ,\nall you need to do is drink contaminated groundwater<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/lada-latent-autoimmune-diabetes-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/lada-latent-autoimmune-diabetes-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many food crops,\nincluding fruits and vegetables, contain pesticide residues after being washed\nor peeled. Chemicals that are no longer used but that are resistant to\nbreakdown for long periods may remain in soil and water and thus in food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MOST PESTICIDES ARE\nHARMFUL TO BEES</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sick, wild birds neglect\ntheir young, abandon their nests, and become more susceptible to predators or\ndisease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IN INDIA WE DO NOT HAVE\nA RISK ASSESSMENT SYSTEM .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS BLOGSITE HAS SENT\nTO MODI MORE THAN A DOZEN TIMES ABOUT THE NEED TO DO RISK ASSESSMENT , EVEN FOR\nSHELL COMPANIES\u2014HE DOES NOT CARE.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We develop our human\nhealth risk assessments using a four-step process:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Step One: Hazard\nIdentification (Toxicity)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Step Two: Dose-Response\nAssessment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Step Three: Exposure\nAssessment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Step Four: Risk\nCharacterization<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount of a substance\na person is exposed to is as important as how toxic the pesticide might be. Dose-response\nassessment examines the numerical relationship between exposure and effects.&nbsp; Even approved doses ( by manufacturers ) damage\nthe DNA and myelin sheath. When it comes to DNA and brain, we conscious humans\nare different from lab rats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our exposure assessment\nexamines what is known about the frequency, timing and levels of contact with a\npesticide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Typical sources of\npesticide exposure:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dietary exposure&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Food - Most of the\nfoods we eat have been grown with the use of pesticides. Therefore, pesticide\nresidues may be present inside or on the surfaces of these foods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drinking Water - Some\npesticides applied to farmland or other land structures can make their way in\nsmall amounts to the ground water or surface water systems that feed drinking\nwater supplies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN BRAZIL NATIONAL\nHEALTH DEPT USED FORMALDEHYDE ON MY SHIP\u2014I HAD A RUNNING BATTLE WITH WHO AND THE BRAZILIAN GOVT ..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">DO YOU THINK THIS PATHETIC\nFELLOW WILL EVER RUB HIS MASTERS\u2014THE WHITE JEWS-- THE WRONG WAY ?</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are essentially\ndestroying the functionality of soil, when you have to feed it more and more\nsynthetic fertilizers just to keep growing a crop.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In our compound at Calicut we have\nmore than a dozen mango trees \u2013 &nbsp;whose fruit is so sweet that we hardly get to\neat it ( worms inside )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I adopted a method\u2014 &nbsp;pluck\nthe mangoes when raw, &nbsp;wash it with warm\nwater , and then ripen it . These mangoes do NOT have worms inside when ripe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chemotherapy for cancer\nnot targeted, it just kills everything. Same with excessive use of broad\nspectrum antibiotics. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Something similar\nhappens in the soil when we use fungicides and pesticides. Pesticides kill the\ngood bugs as well as the bad bugs. Fungicides kill all the fungi in the soil,\nincluding the helpful ones. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But fungi are\nabsolutely essential. We need to bring the fungi back, not kill them off. If\nyou go into a forest, which contains some of the most fertile soils you will\never see, peel the leaf matter back and you will see fungi everywhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you visit a snake\ngrove in Kerala who know what is the meaning of HUMUS laden soil.&nbsp; Snakes do NOT allow any animal to shit in\nthat grove or any sort of human activity &nbsp;. Shit of most animals harm the soil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
