Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "172", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3121444420505124221/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "8145797860352942248", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-05-11T06:24:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-12-13T14:44:54+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTEzMTU2NDk0NDUyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/groundwater-resources-of-india-part-2.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8145797860352942248", "title": "GROUNDWATER RESOURCES OF INDIA , Part 2 \u2014 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 1, BELOW-</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bQ4H2R3Z3ok/WRO4GjE2kWI/AAAAAAABTLQ/P79l0poC0ckTPLsoNEbrN27TZIIoanmiACLcB/s1600/magneKtic_resonance_6.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-bQ4H2R3Z3ok/WRO4GjE2kWI/AAAAAAABTLQ/P79l0poC0ckTPLsoNEbrN27TZIIoanmiACLcB/s400/magneKtic_resonance_6.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Proton Magnetic Resonance\n(PMR), also known as the Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR)</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">, &nbsp;--</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">--is a property of\nhydrogen protons which produce a magnetic field when they are excited by an alternative\nfield in the presence of a static magnetic field. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most hydrogen atoms\nlocated in the ground are coming from water molecules.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The direct detection of\nwater can thus be envisioned with such a method, while conventional geophysical\nmethods only provide structural information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aOzlzyJe6hs/WRO4OPCUk_I/AAAAAAABTLU/wxhme2lueNskjs8qmuh0MU4sKv8M_coKACLcB/s1600/NumEEis_b1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aOzlzyJe6hs/WRO4OPCUk_I/AAAAAAABTLU/wxhme2lueNskjs8qmuh0MU4sKv8M_coKACLcB/s640/NumEEis_b1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PMR property is\ncommonly used by geophysicists in proton magnetometers, for measuring the amplitude\nof the Earth's magnetic field: in that case, the protons excited are those\nlocated in the sensor unit, the measured quantity is the resonance frequency of\nthe protons and the physical quantity determined is the amplitude of the\nEarth's magnetic field, the variations of which are related to the magnetic\nunderground structures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the application of PMR to groundwater detection ,\nthe protons excited are those located in the ground, the measured quantity is\nthe amplitude of the proton relaxation field and the physical parameter\ndetermined is the water content of the underground versus depth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the PMR method,\nthree magnetic fields have to be considered:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. the Earth's field,\nthe amplitude of which determines the precession frequency of the protons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. The excitation\nfield, produced by a current into a loop laid on the surface of the ground, at\na frequency equal to the precession frequency (called the Larmor frequency).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. The relaxation field\nproduced by the protons excited by the previous field. The amplitude of the\nrelaxation field measured at the surface, after the excitation current is\nturned off, is directly linked to the number of protons which have been excited\nand thus to the water content.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NMR method is\nextremely susceptible to electrical noise from nearby power lines.&nbsp; Typical NMR signals are at the nanovolt\nlevel, and as mentioned above, to derive this signal in the presence of high\nambient electrical noise may require up to 8 hours, or may not be possible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nNMR signal is proportional to the ambient (static) magnetic field.&nbsp; Thus, it is not possible to boost the signal\nfrom the groundwater protons by increasing transmitter power.&nbsp; In geologic environments with a high\npercentage of magnetic minerals, the signal from the groundwater can be\nscreened out.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In these cases, NMR\nmeasurements will not work.&nbsp; NMR\nsoundings have a maximum exploration depth of about 100 to 150 m with present\nequipment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In surface PMR\nmeasurements, the depth of investigation depends on two main factors:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The surface of\nantenna which determines the maximum volume investigated: roughly speaking, this\nvolume is limited by the cylinder passing through the antenna and limited to a\ndepth equal to the diameter of the antenna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The moment of the\nexcitation pulse (product of the intensity of current by the duration of the pulse)\nwhich permits to investigate the various layers located between the surface and\nthe maximum depth determined by the surface of the antenna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two &nbsp;factors which\ndepend on the local field conditions also influence the depth of investigation\n:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The rock resistivity:\na conductive ground leads to a lower depth than a resistive one, for a given antenna\nsurface and pulse moment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The Earth's magnetic\nfield: the larger the Earth's field amplitude, the higher the signal amplitude,\nand the easier the detection of deep aquifers; besides, the dip of the Earth's\nfield also influences the depth of investigation which is slightly greater for\na vertical field (pole condition) than for a horizontal field (equator\nposition).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Surface proton magnetic\nresonance sounding (MRS), or nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), measurements can\nbe used to indirectly estimate the water content of saturated and unsaturated\nzones in the earth's subsurface.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRS is used to estimate\naquifer properties, including quantity of water contained in the aquifer,\nporosity, and hydraulic permeability. The MRS method is the only non-invasive\nmethod which directly studies groundwater reservoirs from surface\nmeasurements..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zb_v7tLHA4o/WRO76b6PfsI/AAAAAAABTL0/hlKoefG2ZE0gTPcnPALtdeWqtQA9BzZFQCLcB/s1600/gmEE3r.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"186\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zb_v7tLHA4o/WRO76b6PfsI/AAAAAAABTL0/hlKoefG2ZE0gTPcnPALtdeWqtQA9BzZFQCLcB/s640/gmEE3r.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pulse of current, at\na given frequency is transmitted into a loop. The protons of the groundwater\nare excited. The signal produced during their return to equilibrium is measured\nwith the same loop. To realize a sounding, different pulse moments (A.ms) are\ninjected in the loop, all corresponding to different investigation depths.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PMR is the only\nnon-invasive method which directly studies groundwater reservoirs from surface\nmeasurements. Hydrogen atoms of water molecules are energized by pulses of\nalternative current at the proper frequency (Larmor frequency), transmitted\ninto a loop laid on the ground. The magneto field they produce in return is\nmeasured and analyzed for various energizing pulse moments (intensity x\nduration).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proton Magnetic\nResonance (PMR) is a direct water detection method . &nbsp;It consists in sending electric currents into\nthe ground, then measuring the signals emitted by the nuclei of hydrogen atoms\nin water molecules.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It requires sophisticated equipment including proton\nmagnetometers which can measure electromagnetic fields ; their recordings can\nbe interpreted on site and, most importantly, the quantity of groundwater\npresent in the rock can be deduced in a few seconds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HgpU5xJnv5o/WRO7pn0euUI/AAAAAAABTLs/_6t010T0jy8qdJdTvgc-uuDuoWfLzLskACLcB/s1600/numi33s_a3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"222\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HgpU5xJnv5o/WRO7pn0euUI/AAAAAAABTLs/_6t010T0jy8qdJdTvgc-uuDuoWfLzLskACLcB/s400/numi33s_a3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Groundwater is usually\ngood-quality water. As it is often buried at significant depths, it is highly\nadvisable to locate it as precisely as possible and assess its quantity and\nquality before undertaking costly drilling work and thus avoid costly failures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This water can be\ndetected with more or less precision depending on the methods used, through the\nelectromagnetic waves it emits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The interpretation of\nmeasurements permits to estimate the water content and the mean pore size of\neach layer at depth. These parameters are useful to determine the prospects of\na groundwater reservoir before drilling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eC_A8EqC5cc/WRO7juxTCOI/AAAAAAABTLo/tRcBDSSQ1D8BXB-esJHEHifCJB-AtFJOQCLcB/s1600/geDo_hydro08.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"255\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eC_A8EqC5cc/WRO7juxTCOI/AAAAAAABTLo/tRcBDSSQ1D8BXB-esJHEHifCJB-AtFJOQCLcB/s400/geDo_hydro08.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PMR is a direct method\nfor groundwater detection, as it directly measures the response of the water\nitself (H protons).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A particularity of PMR is the non linear relationship\nbetween the measured signal and the energizing pulse intensity. This means that\ndoubling the pulse current does not mean doubling the signal: instead it\nincreases the depth of investigation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, the PMR signal is\nlinearly related to the water content of the layers, which makes the\ninterpretation quite quick.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This measure gives\naccess to the soil water content (%) and is related to the mean pore size\n(permeability). Proton magnetic resonance Sounding (MRS) is also known as\nSurface Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (SNMR). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ryQhetjTigM/WRO7dYa-YlI/AAAAAAABTLk/XfkziaKhsgQ_oyqJmvnTtrzC-y8oCqPlwCLcB/s1600/surface_nWWmr_wide_area1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"432\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ryQhetjTigM/WRO7dYa-YlI/AAAAAAABTLk/XfkziaKhsgQ_oyqJmvnTtrzC-y8oCqPlwCLcB/s640/surface_nWWmr_wide_area1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In French, the acronym\nRMP (R\u00e9sonance Magn\u00e9tique Protonique) is often used. MRS is a large-scale\nmethod that provides an average water content in the volume of several tens\ncubic meters and the depth between 0 and 100 m approximately. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main advantage of\nthe method, compared to other geophysical tools, is that the magnetic resonance\nsignal is generated by water molecules in the subsurfacel, which ensures that\nthe MRS is selective and only sensitive to groundwater thus rendering\ninterpretation of field data unambiguous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rjnWnSlXqtE/WRO7vAxvMtI/AAAAAAABTLw/V03W2Y0OcOAb0ZDl72mvmuDGATEj9vT_QCLcB/s1600/numis-lite-iris-instrDuments.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rjnWnSlXqtE/WRO7vAxvMtI/AAAAAAABTLw/V03W2Y0OcOAb0ZDl72mvmuDGATEj9vT_QCLcB/s640/numis-lite-iris-instrDuments.jpg\" width=\"451\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NUMISPlus system\nallows the direct detection of groundwater through measurements of the\nrelaxation magnefic field produced by Hydrogen protons from groundwater after\nthey were energized by a current into a loop laid on the ground. It is a\nmodular and more powerful version of the original NUMIS system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xk8gegy-5Hg/WRO7YVh3ntI/AAAAAAABTLg/S53vF5w91n4L4KwFtdM4hFAzkip2y0sjwCLcB/s1600/magnetDic_resonance_3.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"267\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xk8gegy-5Hg/WRO7YVh3ntI/AAAAAAABTLg/S53vF5w91n4L4KwFtdM4hFAzkip2y0sjwCLcB/s400/magnetDic_resonance_3.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THREE\nYEARS AGO I ASKED THE INDIAN GOVT TO BAN PHOSPHATE INFUSED DETERGENTS IN\nINDIA.&nbsp; THE GOVT HAS DONE NOTHING .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>SEVERAL\nMAIN STREAM MEDIA NEWSPAPER HAVE COPIED FROM MY POSTS AND THEY TOO CRIED HOARSE\nABOUT PHOSPHATE .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN\nPLACED LIKE BANGALORE WHERE WATER IS HARD PHOSPHATE INFUSED DETERGENTS CLEAN\nTHE CLOTHES BETTER.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The detergent is\nrendered more effective &nbsp;by chelating\ncalcium and magnesium ions.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Phosphates\nbind calcium and magnesium ions to prevent 'hard-water' type limescale\ndeposits.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ON\nSHIPS WERE HAVE BEEN USING PHOSPHATE FREE DETERGENTS FOR MORE THAN 12 YEARS NOW</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THESE\nLINKS HAVE BEEN SENT TO MODI AT LEAST 20 TIMES .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">YET MODIs MANN KI BAATH AND TWITTER TALK IS\nMINDLESS BULLSHIT , WHERE HE CAN SHINE PERSONALLY.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHAMELESS PRAISING OF ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS AND\nROTHSCHILDs CREATIONS , AGAIN AND AGAIN. &nbsp; &nbsp; NOTHING TO SAVE THE WATAN.</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/foam-froth-on-bangalore-lakes-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/foam-froth-on-bangalore-lakes-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/z7DxqZhb94o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/z7DxqZhb94o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phosphates\nin water cause eutrophication of algae.&nbsp;\nThis leads to a harmful algal bloom which prevents light and oxygen from\ngetting into water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The harm\nof using phosphates is that they remain in wastewater and eventually make their\nway to a natural body of water.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every\nhome around lakes use washing machines with excess detergents . These stupid\npeople think that putting excess detergent cleans the clothes better.&nbsp; It is best to reduce detergent and increase the\ntemperature of water in washing machines.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While phosphates are low toxicity, they instead cause nutrient pollution\nand feed the algae. This leads to eutrophication and harmful algal bloom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India\ncontinues to use phosphate-infused detergents, although they have been banned\nin many other countries due to their polluting nature. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE\nSAME ZIONIST JEW COMPANIES WHICH KEEP THEIR DETERGENTS PHOSPHATE FREE IN EUROPE\nAND USA INFUSE THEIR DETERGENETS WITH PHOSPHATE IN INDIA</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nold way to determine the amount of phosphate in water is using colorimetry. Now\noptical sensors for measurements, are used which could be easier and cheaper<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phosphate\nwill stimulate the growth of plankton and aquatic plants which provide food for\nlarger organisms, including zooplankton, fish, humans, and other mammals.&nbsp;&nbsp; Plankton represents the base of the food\nchain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Initially, this increased\nproductivity will cause an increase in the fish population and overall\nbiological diversity of the system.&nbsp; But\nas the phosphate loading continues and there is a build-up of phosphate in the\nlake or surface water ecosystem, the aging process of lake or surface water\necosystem will be accelerated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Excessive\nnutrient inputs, usually nitrogen and phosphate, have been shown to be the main\ncause of eutrophication over the past 30 years. &nbsp; This aging process can result\nin large fluctuations in the lake water quality and trophic status and in some\ncases periodic blooms of cyanobacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/g0tvk7Xg8cs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/g0tvk7Xg8cs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">People\nwho use groundwater as a source of drinking water need to monitor the level of\nnitrates in their water.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If you drink\nwater that is high in nitrates, it can interfere with the ability of your red\nblood cells to transport oxygen.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Infants who drink water high in nitrates may turn \u201cbluish\u201d and appear to\nhave difficulty in breathing since their bodies are not receiving enough\noxygen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>YOUNG\nPEOPLE JUST GRAVITATE TOWARDS DRUGS .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE\nGREEN REVOLUTION WHICH USES ARTIFICIAL FERTILIZERS HAS CONVERTED PUNJAB INTO A\nDRUGGIE STATE</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">The\nnitrogen and phosphorous in artificial fertilizers that nurture crops become\npollutants when they run off or drain into lakes and streams&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME \u2013 \u201cYOU SAID 90% LAKES IN\nINDIA HAVE DISAPPEARED IN 60 YEARS. HOW CAN LAKES DISAPPEAR \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WELL , AS LONG AS INDIA USED ORGANIC\nFERTILIZERS ( LIKE HUMPED COW DUNG ) WE NEVER HAD A PROBLEM. &nbsp; HUMPLESS COW DUNG IS OVERLOADED WITH NITRATES&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>An\naverage HUMPLESS milking cow produces about 520 GRAMMES per day of nitrogen in\nits urine and feces. &nbsp; &nbsp;In contrast the HUMPED VEDIC COW produces just 55 grammes.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">High\nnitrate levels in drinking water has caused birth defects , low brain power and\nloss of fertility in India</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">VANISHING LAKES IS A GIFT OF THE&nbsp; DESH DROHI GREEN REVOLUTION <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One of the great transformations of\nagriculture over the past century has been the expanded use of synthetic\nchemical fertilizers. Ammonium nitrate is one of the most important of these\nfertilizers.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In recent years, this compound has ranked in the top fifteen among\nsynthetic chemicals produced. The increased use of nitrates as fertilizer has\nled to serious environmental problems.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All nitrates are soluble, so whatever\namount is not taken up by plants in a field is washed away into groundwater\nand, eventually, into rivers, streams, ponds, and lakes.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In these bodies of\nwater, the nitrates become sources of food for algae and other plant life,\nresulting in the formation of algal blooms. Such blooms are THE first step in\nthe eutrophication of a pond or lake.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">As a result of eutrophication, a pond or lake\nslowly evolves into a marsh or swamp, then into a bog, and finally into a fuckin' <span style=\"color: red;\">meadow</span>.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE REVOLUTION\nSCREWED THE WATAN.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;EVIL PHARMA LAUGHED ALL THE WAY TO THE\nBANK.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR YOUNG GENERATION\nHAS LESSER BRAIN POWER DUE TO TOXIC A1 MILK. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">90% DISEASES START IN\nTHE GUT\u2014&nbsp; ALMOST ALL OF IT TRIGGERED BY\nTOXIC A1 MILK . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
