solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2895877549931531622\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_87M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/groundwater-resources-of-india-part-2.html?showComment=1494580143283#c2895877549931531622\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 12, 2017 at 2:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_87MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTEMPT OF COURT CAN BE APPLIED ONLY WITH RESPECT TO \u2013<br />\n<br />\n1) WHAT HAPPENS WITHIN A BRICK AND CEMENT COURT ROOM<br />\n<br />\n2) WHAT HAPPENS WITH RESPECT TO THE CASE BEING ARGUED<br />\n<br />\n3) TO PREVENT A BREAKDOWN OF THE SYSTEM--WHERE SOMEONE DEFIES THE JUDGE --WITHIN THE PERIMETER OF THE SPECIFIC CASE BEING ARGUED<br />\n<br />\n\"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" CANNOT BE APPLIED TO KARNAN WHO DECLARED THAT SOME JUDGES ARE CORRUPT<br />\n<br />\nCONTEMPT OF COURT CANNOT BE APPLIED UNDERWATER, UNDER THE GROUND , IN SPACE , ANYWHERE ON LAND-- NO JUDGE IS GOD . OUR CONSTITUTION IS VERY VERY CLEAR ON THIS<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL WESTERN NATIONS HAVE ABOLISHED \"CONTEMPT OF COURT \" EVEN INSIDE THE COURTROOM --WITHIN THE PERIMETER OF THE SPECIFIC CASE BEING ARGUED<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE CONSTITUTION GIVES EVERY CITIZEN THE RIGHT TO FREE SPEECH AS LONG AS HE DOES NOT FILIBUSTER OR DISRUPT COURT PROCEEDINGS OR STAMP ON THE AUTHORITY OF THE JUDGE&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIN USA JURY DECIDES THE CASE-- NOT THE JUDGE . JURY IS MADE OF ORDINARY CITIZENS WHO KNOW SHIT ABOUT LAW OR THE CONSTITUTION.<br />\n<br />\nTHE JURY USES CONSCIENCE AND DELIVERS NATURAL JUSTICE<br />\n<br />\nJURY IS NOT TIED DOWN BY PROCEDURES<br />\n<br />\nJURY KNOWS THE CONTEXT OF THE CASE<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA WE MUST GO BACK TO THE JURY SYSTEM<br />\n<br />\nON TV WE HEARD CUNTS ( PAST SUPREME COURT JUDGES AND LAWYERS )SAYING THAT THEY CANT COMMENT AS THE CASE IF \"SUBJUDICE \"<br />\n<br />\nSORRY-- SUBJUDICE APPLIES ONLY FOR THE JURY SYSTEM.<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA OUR JURY SYSTEM WAS ABOLISHED AS PARSIS PULLED STRINGS AND GOT A JURY WHO WOULD SAVE A MURDERER PARSI-- COMMANDER NANAVATI WHO SHOT HIS WHITE WIFEs SINDHI LOVER<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nOn 30 January, the Supreme Court sent M.V. Jayarajan, a politician from the Communist Party of India (Marxist), to jail for four weeks for calling judges shumban ( DENSE HEADED OR SLOW ON UPTAKE ) in a speech critical of judicial activism in the Kerala high court.<br />\n<br />\nThe Contempt of Courts Act, 1971, very clearly states that fair criticism of any case which has been heard and decided is not contempt\u2026 And as conceded by even the judges who sent Jayarajan to jail ( later ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1970, when E.M.S. Namboodiripad, then chief minister of Kerala, made a comment on how Marx and Engels considered the judiciary to be an instrument of oppression, the Supreme Court punished him for contempt on the grounds that he lowered the prestige of judges and courts in the eyes of the people.<br />\n<br />\nSORRY --JUDGES ARE NOT GOD.<br />\n<br />\nJUDGES WERE LAWYERS BEFORE<br />\n<br />\nEVERYBODY WHO IS NOT A HALF WIT ON THIS PLANET KNOWS WHO LAWYERS ARE -AND THEIR MORAL FIBRE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>SO LEOPARDS LOST THEIR SPOTS --IN A JIFFY ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAYYYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- THIS CANNOT CONTINUE LIKE THIS ANYMORE<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE A RIGHT TO OPINION -- THIS IS WHAT A HEALTHY DEMOCRACY IS ALL ABOUT<br />\n<br />\nNO JUDGE CAN TAKE AWAY YOUR FREEDOM OF SPEECH -- WHERE YOU TELL THE TRUTH<br />\n<br />\nKARNAN SAID --SOME JUDGES ARE CORRUPT . SO WHAT IS WRONG --LET HIM PROVE IT .<br />\n<br />\nPUTTING \"CONTEMPT \" FOR SAYING THIS -- ON A HIGH COURT JUDGE HAS DAMAGED THE SYSTEM ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL BE PART OF JUDICIAL STUDIES FOR CENTURIES IN INDIA AND THE WORLD.<br />\n<br />\nI HAD 66A ( DEFAMATION ) BEING SLAPPED ON BE BY A CRYING BOLLYWOOD SUPERSTAR .<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- TELLING TRUTH CANT BE DEFAMATION<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nLike many other laws, we\u2019ve inherited the offence of \u2018scandalising the court\u2019 from the British. Initially, it was reasoned that judges were appointees of the king ( READ A JEW ROTHSCHILD ) and to abuse the judge was to abuse the king himself.<br />\n<br />\nExcept, the last time the UK convicted a person for scandalising the honour of the judiciary, was 1931\u2014i.e., 84 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL 8 PARTS --<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL 12 PARTS -<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN MODIs, LAW MINISTERs, ATTORNEY GENERALs AND SUBRAMNIAN SWAMYs WEBSITE-- TELL SWAMY TO DO SOMETHING USEFUL FOR THE WATAN.. &nbsp; SWAMY IS GETTING OLD-- HE MUST DO SOMETHING GOOD WHICH WILL LEAVE A LASTING FAIR NAME FOR HIMSELF ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Capt. SHE WAS VERY HAPPY WHEN I WAS VINDICATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN THE CASE OF GENIUS DIVYA NARENDRA , HIS SLEEING PARTNERS THE VINKLEVOSS TWINS HAD THE WHEREWITHAL TO SUE JEW MARK ZUCKERBERG --AND THEY CATAPULTED THEMSELVES TO FAME --USING A HOLLYWOOD MOVIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT CORNELL ONCE A KOREAN UNDERGRADUATE BOY TEAMED UP WITH MY ELDER SON ( MASTERS ) FOR A PROJECT IN COMPUTER SCIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THEY DECIDED ON WHAT THEY WOULD DO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE KOREAN BOY THEN WROTE THE ENTIRE CODE \"LIKE HOW HE WOULD WRITE A LETTER TO HIS FRIEND\"-- THIS WAS WHAT MY SON TOLD ME AND MY WIFE ON SKYPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT FREQUENT INTERVALS HE WOULD CRAVE THE INDULGENCE OF MY SON\u2014IMPLORING \"SIR, AM I RIGHT\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS SO EMBARRASSED -- THE KOREAN DID THE WHOLE PROJECT IN ONE FLOWING SHOT -- LITERALLY THANKFUL WHEN MY SON SAID-- \" YES , CONTINUE\" TO HIS \" SIR- AM I RIGHT SO FAR ? \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS WRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE EVERYTHING&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;-- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE CODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE LOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014 I COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING PARTNER IN THIS PROJECT. HE WAS HONEST TO ADMIT IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON INSISTED AND WROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES REQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs NAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS A MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A MATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING IDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM AN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN CLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN THE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS PRICELESS FINDINGS . THE JEW BASTARDS STOLE IT. AFTER THAT RAMANUJAN USED TO DO HIS WORK ON A SLATE , RUB IT OFF AND RETAIN RESULTS INSIDE HIS HEAD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN WAS POISONED \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">HIS YOUNG WIFE STARTED CRYING BITTERLY ( SHE WAS NOT THE CRYING TYPE ) AS SOON AS THE PYRE WAS LIT AND FEL INTO A FAINT -- WHEN WELL WISHERS PRESSED HER, SHE REVEALED THE TRUTH ABOUT THE \"LOST DIARY\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">EVERY TIME RAMANUJAN MADE A BREAK THROUGH DISCOVERY IN MATH , AFTER TWO WEEKS A WHITE JEW PROFESSOR WOULD COME AND ASK HIM \"SRINIVASAN , DO YOU KNOW THIS JEW MATH NERD FROM POLAND --BECAUSE HE FOUND OUT THE SAME THREE WEEKS BEFORE YOU DID \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/fractal-mind-of-srinivasa-ramanujan.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/fractal-mind-of-srinivasa-ramanujan.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN THE COMPUTER INDUSTRY MAXIMUM STARTUPS ARE BY WHITE JEWS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Its discovery was announced in 2011 at a meeting of the Brazilian Geophysical Society in Rio de Janeiro.[2][3] The unofficial name is in honour of scientist Valiya Mannathal Hamza, of Brazil's National Observatory,[4] who has undertaken research on the region for four decades.[5] The Hamza \"river\" and the Amazon River form a geologically unusual instance of a twin-river system flowing at different levels of the earth's crust.UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nHAMZA IS A MUSLIM FROM CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN )<br />\n<br />\nTWO YEARS BEFORE THE DISCOVERY , I HAD MENTIONED THE SUBTERRANEAN AMAZON RIVER COMPONENT IN MY BLOGPOST<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/amazon-navigation-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br RIVER&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br />A MIGHTY RIVER WILL FIND A WAY -- WATER FINDS ITS WAY NATURALLY TO A LOW LEVEL&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />MUCH OF THE DAM RESERVOIR WATER IN GANGES FLOWS UNDER THE DAM WALL --BY AN UNDERGROUND COMPONENT AND IS LOST FOR HUMAN USE .<br /><br />IT IS A WASTE WHEN IT FLOWS DOWN INTO THE SEA ( LIKE IN AMAZON )</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDAMS HAVE BEEN MADE IN INDIA BY MAD MEN<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br />NOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS A DESILTING FACILITY</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED YOU HAVE TO RAISE THE LEVEL OF WATER IN THE RESERVOIR AS IS BEING DONE IN INDIA IN A CRIMINAL MANNER<br />\n<br />\nTHIS CAUSES THE RESERVOIR WATER TO SUBMERGE MORE LAND<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INCREASES THE WATER SURFACE AREA AND HENCE MORE EVAPORATION<br />\n<br />\nWATER EVAPORATION MUST BE CONTAINED- &nbsp;OR IT IS LIKE THE BANK KEEPING MONEY ON THE STREETS AT NIGHT<br />\n<br />\nEVAPORATION CAN BE CONTROLLED BY WHITE OR SILVER ( NON -TOXIC ) FLOATING BALLS --WHICH CAN BE REMOVED IN THE RAINY MONTHS<br />\n<br font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: medium;\">WHITE OR SILVER COLOUR REFLECTS SUNS HEAT AWAY--MOST IMPORTANT -- NON-TOXIC SILVER IS THE BEST&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html?showComment=1477483145723#c8966828485855009391\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 26, 2016 at 5:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_93MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nrajesh maurya<br />\nOctober 26, 2016 at 11:59 AM<br />\nSIR,<br />\n<br />\nI WANT TO KNOW SPECIFICALLY ABOUT POTASSIUM HUMATE, ITS POTENTIAL TO ELIMINATE SOIL TOXICITY, REJUVENATION AND RESTORATION OF SOIL FERTILITY. ALREADY GONE THROUGH AGNIHOTRA POST.....TESTED IT ON FIELD TRIAL BUT EFFECT WAS MINIMAL AS THE LAND IS TOXIC DUE TO USE OF CHEMICAL FERTILIZERS. SOME COMPANIES CLAIM THAT POTASSIUM HUMATE IS THE POTENTIAL SOIL REJUVENATORY MATERIAL SO I WISH TO HEAR ABOUT POTASSIUM HUMATE FROM THE TOP MOST AUTHORITY ON CHEMICAL ON THIS PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nKINDLY ENLIGHTEN.<br />\n<br />\nDelete<br />\n################<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nOctober 26, 2016 at 5:21 PM<br />\nhi rm<br />\nKONTRRROOLLL -- only captain can use UC.<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid is abundant in Keralas\u2019 top soil. Legend has it that 6000 years ago , Lord Parashurama CREATED snake groves in Kerala to increase Humus acid in Kerals\u2019s top soil.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE BEEN USING HUMIC ACID ON MY LAWN FOR PAST 15 YEARS. &nbsp; I DO NOT USE CHEMICALS ON MY LAWN.<br />\n<br />\nYou can\u2019t buy humus. Every product that calls itself humus, is just some form of compost.<br />\n<br />\nThe gardeners job is to increase the amount of humus in soil. Think of humus as being a big sponge that can hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. This water holding capacity of humus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil without humus.<br />\n<br />\nHumus is the most important thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter.<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IN TOP SOIL GAVE INDIA PRICELESS FLORA FOLLOWING THE GOLDEN MEAN.<br />\n<br />\nCompost is NOT humus.<br />\n<br />\nOrganic matter is a catch all phrase used to describe a wide range of molecules including starches, proteins, sugars, carbohydrates, amino acids etc.<br />\n<br />\nWhen organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down into smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly bacteria and fungi).<br />\n<br />\nDuring the humification process, microbes secrete sticky gum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil by holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil.<br />\n<br />\nToxic substances such as heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound to the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the wider ecosystem.<br />\n<br />\nToday humus rich snake groves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition<br />\n<br />\n200 years ago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, the most abundant source of Humic acid rich soil. Today we have just around 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast.<br />\n<br />\nSnakes keep away animals and rodents whose excreta degrades the humus .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s holy humus rich top soil was was decimated by the FATHER OF GREEN REVOLUTION and GM companies. India was a blessed nation with holy topsoil.<br />\n<br />\nVedic humped cow Cow dung is high in organic materials and rich in nutrients. It contains about 3 percent nitrogen, 2 percent phosphorus, and 1.5% percent potassium (3-2-1 NPK).<br />\n<br />\nIn humus, carbon frequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one. Humpless western cow dung has too much nitrogen.<br />\n<br />\nHumic acid is not a substitute to chemical fertilizers and bio-fertilizers. It increases water retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity, enzymes in soil, etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to humus, which contains humic and fulvic substances. The humic substance contains various functional groups of carboxylic, carbonyl, phenolic, alcoholic with higher molecular weight of 40,000 to 70,000 and higher cation exchange capacity (100-130 meq/100 gm). Lignite contains more of humic acid.<br />\n<br />\nAll commercial crops, cereals, pulses, oilseeds, vegetables, trees, orchards, green house crops, ornamental plants, grass lawns and nurseries can be sprayed with potassium humate in soil before planting<br />\n<br />\nPotassium humate can be mixed with organic manures and fertilizers, applied as seed soaking treatment, root application, foliar application or used directly during fertigation.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_93BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_92T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_92TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_92TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_92TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_92TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_92TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_92TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_92TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_92TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_92B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2458444225807743687\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_92M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html?showComment=1477483161764#c2458444225807743687\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 26, 2016 at 5:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_92MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThe quinoidine and active acids within the liquid product of potassium humate have strong potentiality of oxidation, which restrains the activities of free radicals and hence, avails the development of the foliage and positively influences plants metabolism, photosynthesis, respiration, activity of ferments.<br />\n<br />\nPotassium, acting on the cell level, facilitates the absorption of nutrients by the roots and the exchange of gases through the stomata; this element is also a vital constituent of chlorophyll, speeding up photosynthesis.<br />\n<br />\nPotassium Humate alleviates the toxicity of pesticide residue and prevents soil from contamination of heavy metallic ions as well as other harmful matters.<br />\n<br />\nThe high Cation Exchange Capacity of the product improves the utilization of fertilizers. It combines with such elements as Nitrogen, Phosphorus and Potassium which constitute in highly-efficient multi-function compound fertilizers.<br />\n<br />\nAt some point, all of the good stuff in the organic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by micro-organisms or plants. This remaining material is called humus. It consists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just can decompose it any further. Humus is so stable that it can persist in the soil for hundreds of years.<br />\n<br />\nHumus has a negative charge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus, including ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to name a few. The humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from washing them away.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a plant root comes in contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the humus sponge. The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can think of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants.<br />\n<br />\nThe most important reason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation.<br />\nAggregation is what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil. Better soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots to grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most importantly oxygen.<br />\n<br />\nHumus is a colloidal substance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability to store nutrients by chelation. While these nutrient cations are accessible to plants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or irrigation<br />\n<br />\nHealthy soils contain 2.5 to 5% organic matter, by weight (5 -10% by volume). This number does not include the humus amount. Too much organic matter can be a problem for soils so adding huge amounts of organic matter in order to build humus quickly is not a good idea.<br />\n<br />\nHumus can hold the equivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the soil's capacity to withstand drought condition . The biochemical structure of humus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil conditions<br />\n<br />\nHUMUS IS DECIMATED BY CHEMICAL FERTILISERS.<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE FARMER SUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL.<br />\n<br />\nAPCO MODI IS TOO BUSY ANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS.<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL NADU MUST UNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_93b+seedD0uZD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">SHIT COTTON, &nbsp;GM BT COTTON IS ONE OF THE MOST WATER INTENSIVE CROPS.</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">BASTARD DESH DROHIS HAVE GROWN BT COTTON IN AREAS WITH LOW GROUND WATER LEVELS&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">----AND DEPRIVED FARMERS OF PRECIOUS GROUND WATER&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/07/deep-vein-thrombosis-dvt-pulmonary.html?showComment=1468119924663#c5265023504309576800\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 10, 2016 at 8:35 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_32MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chandigarh/Whitefly-fear-Cotton-acreage-drops-to-61-year-low/articleshow/53135445.cms<br />\n<br />\nThe fibre / lint quality of GMO cotton is very poor. . .<br />\n<br />\nWhen a BT Cotton pod breaks the flying SHORTER LENGTH LINT gives lung problems. . .<br />\n<br />\nMonsanto SHOUTS cotton yields are up,-- B A L L S , YOU LIARS ! . .<br />\n<br />\nHey Monsanto c u n t s ---understand the meaning of the word SHORT LENGTH OF LINT ? ..<br />\n<br />\nThe amount machines are able to extract from the picked cotton has diminished. . .<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, Bt cotton produces both less cotton lint, and lint of an inferior quality. . .<br />\n<br />\nCotton fiber quality is defined by the physical properties that relate to its spin ability into yarn and contribute to textile performance and quality. . .<br />\n<br />\nThe most important of these properties are those associated with the length, strength and fineness (micronaire) of the fiber. One of the most important aspects of cotton fiber quality is fiber or staple length. . .<br />\n<br />\nFiber length is the normal length of a typical portion of the fibers of a cotton sample. Longer fibers can be processed at greater efficiencies and produce finer and stronger yarns by allowing fibers to twist around each other more times, while shorter fiber require increased twisting during spinning, causing low-strength and poor-quality yarns. . .<br />\n<br />\nFiber fineness is another important component of fiber quality because of its direct impact on processing performance and the quality of end product. . .<br />\n<br />\nFiber strength is important because the inherent breaking strength of individual cotton fiber is considered to be the most important factor in determining the strength of the yarn spun from those fibers. . .<br />\n<br />\nJEW DARLING APCO MODI AND HIS PMO WILL SAY ALL ABOVE IS FICTION. . .<br />\n<br />\nThey have just focused on a single single trait \u2013 pest resistance ( SIC )\u2013 compromising on cotton quality. ..<br />\n<br />\nMy hometown Calicut produced the best cotton fabric ( CALICO ) on this planet\u2014today with BT Cotton all this is history. ..<br />\n<br />\nFiber strength is an important parameter in determining yarn spinning value. . .<br />\n<br />\nJEW DARLING MODI will never have the commonsense to understand this \u2013 WHEN YOU RAISE QUANTITY , QUALITY REDUCES ---<br />\n<br />\nHigh fiber strength is impossible to obtain without sacrificing yield. . .<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">hi capt<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">does eucalyptus causes lowering groundwater levels in the region?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">according to article<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">a native of Australia, the eucalyptus tree has been accused of being an environmental disaster with its thirst for water and propensity towards soil depletion. A eucalyptus tree consumes 90 litres of water a day<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">During summers and times of drought, its roots can go down up to 30ft<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ReplyDelete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">####################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Capt. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The water extracted\nfrom sugarcane itself can be processed and diverted it back into the\nsugar-making process. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drought prone Marathwada\nitself has 62 sugar factories all of which consume CRIMINAL &nbsp;quantities of scarce water. &nbsp;&nbsp;The average water consumption of a factory at\n14.2 lakh litres each day, to process up to 5,000 tonnes of cane. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Maharashtra's water farmers\ngrew sugarcane in 2.1 lakh hectares of land \u2013 around 10.1% of the state\u2019s\ncultivated area \u2013 yet consumed 73% of its irrigation water.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So if sugarcane is such\na water monster, why are farmers planting it at all? &nbsp;It is about taking LIPE-- nay life EAJJJJJY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To begin with,\nsugarcane is impervious to most diseases. It is a particularly hardy grass that\nneeds little care. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To add to the sense of\nsecurity, in the past, sugar factories functioned as cooperatives of farmers.\nOnce a farmer enrolled as a member of the cooperative, he was assured that his\ncrop would be purchased. The factory even sent labourers to harvest it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Majja hai gaand par\nbaithne ka \u2013 phukkat ka paisa banaane ka \u2013middle man bhi naaahi hai \u2013crop pests\nbhi naaahi hai !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The private politicians\nBIG FISH sugar barons ( who operate SHELL companies too ) prefer not to enter\ninto long-term arrangements with farmers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When sugar cooperatives\nwere initiated in the socialist 1960s, large numbers of farmers, running into\nthe tens of thousands, contributed either land or money to buy shares in the\nfactories. While the farmers technically held voting rights to elect office\nbearers every five years, over time the control over the cooperatives passed\ninto the hands of politicians and their associates.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FARMER SUICIDES HELPED\nPRIVATE BIG FISH IN USURPING LAND .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We\nknow the BIG FISH who monopolizes sugar factories in Baramati and Pune, and\nanother BIG FISH who has monopoly over Beed and Solapur. Acquiring heavy stakes\nin sugar, Maharashtra's political class has sunk vast public funds in it,\ngiving it the scale of infrastructure that other crops lack.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Why is wheat growing\nNorth India growing GM rice which consumes six times more water than wheat &nbsp;?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Northern India's water table is sinking fast due\nto excessive cultivation of water-intensive crops like rice, to produce a\nkilogramme of which requires roughly 6.5 times the amount a typical person\nwould drink in a year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The agricultural shift\nby profit-motivated young KNEDAAA WAAALI PUNJAAAABI MUNDA farmers has made things\nworse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugarcane consumes a huge\namount of ground water during its 14-month long growing cycle compared to just\n4 million liters over four months for chickpeas, commonly grown in India and\ncalled gram locally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Growing sugarcane in\ndrought-prone areas is a recipe for water famine. Yet, the land area under\nsugarcane cultivation in Maharashtra has gone up from 1,67,000 hectares in\n1970-71 to 1,022,000 ha in 2011-12. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Did\nwe have an agriculture minister ?&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Did we\nhave a water resources minister ?&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Did we have a PM ?</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharashtra is India\u2019s\nsecond-biggest producer of this water-intensive crop, despite being one of the\ncountry\u2019s drier States.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Politicians opened\nsugar mills everywhere, even in areas where drinking water is not available. They\ndug deep borewells , build dams and canals to service their own factories<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some farmers in these\nparched states now need to dig 300 feet for water, compared to five feet in the\n1960s, according to research by a local government scientist. They\u2019ve been\ndrilling wells deep beneath the tilled soil into the volcanic rock \u2013 even 900\nfeet down.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In some severely\naffected areas, bore wells as deep as 1700 feet have all gone dry. The\nunderground water level has dropped so much that there is no water at all. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sugarcane is such a\nwater intensive crop and requires 1200 mm of water, which is roughly 21 times\nmore than the annual recharge rate. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It\nis simple mathematics to calculate that the rate of recharge of the groundwater\nis way below than the extraction. But all were scared\u2014sugar barons held vote\nbanks</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eU9XU-yV9U0/WRAoc7BRcwI/AAAAAAABTI8/-XSwuph1qFYbuyKi1YlU2Phd_jkbLbmoACLcB/s1600/1-A4Z5Dcy9Uc9674OLm9Tb1BQ.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eU9XU-yV9U0/WRAoc7BRcwI/AAAAAAABTI8/-XSwuph1qFYbuyKi1YlU2Phd_jkbLbmoACLcB/s640/1-A4Z5Dcy9Uc9674OLm9Tb1BQ.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The worst hit districts\nare Latur and Solapur, which got the media headlines not for the scarcity of\nwater and the severe hardship the people are facing, but for receiving a water\ntrain after three years of steady drought.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No measures, have been taken, to\nensure long term relief leaving experts to point that the districts are not\ngoing to be free of drought and shortage of drinking water in the foreseeable\nfuture. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Latur, for instance,\ncultivates the largest amount of sugarcane in Marathwada. &nbsp;&nbsp;Latur has 45,000 hectares of land under sugar\nfarming. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solapur, as per\nNational Agriculture Research Project (NARP) classification of Agro-climatic\nzones of the country, fall under the scarcity zone MH-6 security zone. &nbsp;&nbsp;Still, this district houses the largest\nnumber of sugar factories - 32 in Maharashtra. &nbsp;&nbsp;Latur has 10 sugar mills of the 70 sugar\nfactories in the Marathwada region.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It takes 25,000 litres\nof water to irrigate 1 kilogram of sugar.&nbsp;\nOn an average, 25,00,000 litres of water are required to crush 2500\ntonnes of sugar cane a day.&nbsp; &nbsp;The quantum of water needed for sugar farming\nindustry is indicative of the intense pressure on groundwater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHO CARES ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHITE JEWS WILL GIVE MODI &nbsp;FDI MONEY .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>VIKAAAAS CAN BE DONE BY\nFOREIGN KOSHER MONEY, RIGHT MR MODI ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WRONG !</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL\nDEMAND ACCOUNTABILITY IN FUTURE .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ILrLVGCJfx0/WRAoVqnwhEI/AAAAAAABTI4/ADwCcoWOI_gdjsp4zXuS6vC7xWesL_jJACLcB/s1600/el-nino-sugar-proCduction-surplus.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ILrLVGCJfx0/WRAoVqnwhEI/AAAAAAABTI4/ADwCcoWOI_gdjsp4zXuS6vC7xWesL_jJACLcB/s640/el-nino-sugar-proCduction-surplus.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE\nMOVE ETHANOL ( WHITE BACARDI RUM / FUEL ADDITIVE ) , MOLASSES AND BIOFUELS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/molasses-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/molasses-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/06/biodiesels-and-biofuels-on-chemical_05.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/06/biodiesels-and-biofuels-on-chemical_05.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1998, the\nBrazilian light duty vehicle fleet of 16.5 million consumed approximately 13\nbillion litres of ethanol. About 42 per cent of it was blended with gasoline\nand the balance 58 per cent was consumed by neat alcohol-driven vehicles. When\nthe regulation in Brazil mandated blending of a minimum of 5 per cent of\nanhydrous alcohol with gasoline, no engine modifications were necessary.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blending upto 10 per cent ethanol with gasoline does not require any\nsignificant changes in automobile engines. However, ethanol content beyond 10\nper cent in gasoline requires some modifications in engines to avoid problems\nrelated to performance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During 1975-79, Brazil had also developed ethanol\nvehicles which run on neat hydrous ethanol. The vehicles had gasoline engines\nconverted to ethanol by undertaking major modifications such as the use of\nhigher compression ratios, carburettor recalibrations, spark timing\noptimisation and intake design.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, a small gasoline tank was also\nprovided only for starting the engine.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 14.2 billion liters of ethanol is produced from sugarcane in\nBrazil every year. This substitutes about 2,00,000 barrels of gasoline per day.\nBrazil produces 14 billion litres of ethanol from molasses and sugarcane juice\nagainst India\u2019s production of 1.3 billion litres from molasses alone.&nbsp; The sugarcane productivity at 70 tonnes per\nhectare and sugar recovery of 12-13 per cent in Brazil is also comparable to\nIndia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\">SUDDEN RELEASE OF METHANE CAUSES THE LAKE TO\nFROTH AND FOAM.</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/foam-froth-on-bangalore-lakes-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/foam-froth-on-bangalore-lakes-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Barometric pressure is the weight of the\noverlying air pressing down on the earth. &nbsp; It is also known as atmospheric pressure.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Low barometric pressure means the overlying\nair is rising, whereas high pressure means the overlying air is sinking.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Barometric pressure&nbsp; affects the amount of gas that can dissolve\nin water. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>More gas, such as oxygen, can dissolve in\nwater under higher pressure when compared to lower air pressure. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>For instance, more oxygen is dissolved in\nwater at sea level than at high altitude which has less atmospheric pressure .<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The pressure of the overlying air forces more\ngas into solution. As the overlying atmospheric pressure decreases, gas is\nreleased from solution. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>A common\nexample of this is when someone opens a carbonated beverage.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>High barometric pressure supports sunny,\nclear, and favorable weather conditions, but lower levels promotes stormy , rainy\nand cloudy weather conditions.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The\nkey requirement for formation of a seiche is that the body of water be at least\npartially bounded, allowing the formation of the standing wave.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">LET ME PLAY AN APT SONG FOR THE INDIAN THINK TANK \"<span style=\"color: red;\">THINKERS</span>\"-- &nbsp;( PATHETIC CREATURES )&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/66t7Qhi7KPg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/66t7Qhi7KPg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">Water boils at 100 deg\nC , but if we increase the tank pressure theoretically to 217 Bars, water will\nboil only at 374 deg C.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is why on\nPropylene oxide carriers, they load tanks with PV lift at +6000 mm AQ, if they\nhave no cooling systems like on refrigerated gas carriers..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/W-qyvXIIaxU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/W-qyvXIIaxU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">InSAR satellites use\nelectromagnetic waves to monitor tiny, centimetre-scale changes in the\nelevation of Earth\u2019s surface.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They use </span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">algorithms </span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">to\nautomate this previously time-consuming pixel selection process. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">By this methodology\nthey</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">find high-quality InSAR pixels in\nmany more locations . &nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The algorithm also\nfills in, or interpolates, groundwater levels in the spaces between pixels\nwhere high-quality InSAR data are not available.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Interpolation is a form\nof averaging, but it requires high-quality InSAR data from places that are\nlocated near monitoring wells where groundwater levels are already known in\norder to calibrate the link between the InSAR data and groundwater levels<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, scientists\nwere able to calculate surface deformations \u2013 and, by extension, groundwater\nlevels \u2013 for the entire agricultural basins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were able to show\nhow groundwater levels in the basin changed over time from 2007 to 2011 \u2013 the\nyears when InSAR data that could be analysed by the algorithm were available.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In mathematics and\ncomputer science, an algorithm is a self-contained sequence of actions to be\nperformed. Algorithms can perform calculation, data processing and automated\nreasoning tasks.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An algorithm is an\neffective method that can be expressed within a finite amount of space and time\nand in a well-defined formal language for calculating a function.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Starting from an initial state and initial\ninput (perhaps empty),&nbsp; the instructions\ndescribe a computation that, when executed, proceeds through a finite &nbsp;number of well-defined successive states,\neventually producing \"output\" and terminating at a final ending\nstate. The transition from one state to the next is not necessarily\ndeterministic; some algorithms, known as randomized algorithms, incorporate\nrandom input.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>THIS PLANET MUST KNOW\nTHAT <span style=\"color: red;\">ALGORITHMS </span>WERE FIRST INVENTED BY INDIANS &nbsp; </b></span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :--The words\n'</span><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">algorithm</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">' and 'algorism' come from the name al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b.[60] Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b\n(Persian: \u062e\u0648\u0627\u0631\u0632\u0645\u06cc\u200e\u200e, c. 780\u2013850) was a Persian mathematician, astronomer,\ngeographer, and scholar in the House of Wisdom in Baghdad, whose name means\n'the native of Khwarezm', a region that was part of Greater Iran and is now in\nUzbekistan.[61][62] About 825, he wrote a treatise in the Arabic language,\nwhich was translated into Latin in the 12th century under the title Algoritmi\nde numero Indorum. This title means </span><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Algoritmi on the numbers of the Indians\",</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nwhere \"Algoritmi\" was the translator's Latinization of Al-Khwarizmi's\nname.[63] Al-Khwarizmi was the most widely read mathematician in Europe in the\nlate Middle Ages, primarily through his other book, the Algebra.[64] In late\nmedieval Latin, algorismus, English 'algorism', the corruption of his name,\nsimply meant the \"decimal number system\". In the 15th century, under\nthe influence of the Greek word \u1f00\u03c1\u03b9\u03b8\u03bc\u03cc\u03c2 'number' (cf. 'arithmetic'), the Latin\nword was altered to algorithmus, and the corresponding English term 'algorithm'\nis first attested in the 17th century; the modern sense was introduced in the\n19th century.[65] UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS NOT SOMETHING\nTHAT I AM EXPOSING NOW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt.
