font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALGEBRA is derived from\nAl-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations.\nAlgorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's\nKit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a\nlist of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the\nperiod between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became\nthe centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists\nfrom as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He\nworked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph\nal-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the\ntranslation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj\nal-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and\nHind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical\nand astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and\nastrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many\nArabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the\nsindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon\nand the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in\nIslamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily\nresearch approach to the field, translating works of others and learning\nalready discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_ibn_Musa_al-Khwarizmi</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Al-Biruni was a\nSanskrit scholar who learnt Math and astronomy in from Namboodiri professors\nadept in Sanskrit and Arabic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\nagain-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote\nan encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in\nwhich he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion,\nhistory, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a\nsimple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories\nof the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them\nsimilar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing\nbetween them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ajit Vadakayil</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">November 12, 2015 at 2:47 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus considered\nMuslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over time, Al-Biruni\nwon the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with\nthese Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into\nArabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as\npracticed in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by\nIndian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be\ndiscovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun\nis the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude,\nseasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was\nalso critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian\ndocuments while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations\nas well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th\ncentury, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">While others were\nkilling each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable\nability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this\ndramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet,\nimpartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns,\nand burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India).\n(Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANCIENT ARABS AND\nGREEKS DO NOT HAVE A SINGLE INVENTION OR DISCOVERY repeat NOT A SINGLE\nINVENTION OR DISCOVERY , WHICH IS NOT STOLEN FROM INDIA .. . THE GREEK AND\nARABIC TRANSLATIONS WERE DONE IN KERALA KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zakir Naik can stop\nboasting that Arab Muslims\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AL HULL BURRR invented\nMath<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AL KULL HURRR invented\nastronomy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AL PRRRR KURR invented\nscience<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">--and get faalthu\nwahabi awards from the CRYPTO JEW Al Saud synasty. Mind you this man is giving\naway his motherlands discoveries to an alien Muslim nation ruled by crypto jew\nbloodline installed by Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire Math ,\nastronomy , science in Arabic was sold in gold by Kerala Kings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/toRxWrHf1QA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/toRxWrHf1QA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">InSAR satellites\nmonitor changes in the elevation of the surface of the Earth on a very small\nscale using electromagnetic waves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes in groundwater\nlevels have been shown to influence surface elevation, but these measurements\nwere difficult to distinguish if cities or agricultural fields were obscuring\nthe satellite picture. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Stanford team was\nable to gather data for more locations using InSAR with the help of the\nalgorithm, which interpolates groundwater levels between available InSAR\nimages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The satellites use\ninterferometric synthetic aperture radar ( InSAR ).&nbsp;&nbsp; It is a radar technique that measures the\nshape of the surface of Earth and can be used to track shape changes over time.\nEarth scientists often use InSAR to measure how much the ground has shifted\nafter an earthquake.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-S0HEKX8olXg/WRIXa0wgKaI/AAAAAAABTK0/9Mu69w59TPg9L7YijAaX3Lw9BVof8z1egCLcB/s1600/wrapped_unwrappeed_ifm-sml1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"306\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-S0HEKX8olXg/WRIXa0wgKaI/AAAAAAABTK0/9Mu69w59TPg9L7YijAaX3Lw9BVof8z1egCLcB/s640/wrapped_unwrappeed_ifm-sml1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While continuously\norbiting, a satellite sends an electromagnetic wave down to the surface. The\nwave then bounces back up and is detected by the satellite. The properties of\nthe wave tell scientists how far the wave traveled before it was reflected\nback. This distance is directly related to the position of the ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the satellite\ncompletes a circle around the globe, it returns to the same location to send\ndown another radar wave and take another measurement. Measurements are taken\nevery 35 days and data collection can go on for years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">InSAR has water\nwatching abilities.&nbsp; InSAR works by\nbeaming radar waves at the surface of the Earth. The wave bounces off the\nsurface and returns to the satellite, traveling in an undulating, up-down,\nsinusoidal wave.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The height of the ground determines where the wave is in its\noscillation as it returns to the satellite. The same ground can be re-scanned\nagain in, say, a month or two, to detect changes in the surface level and shape\nwithin an accuracy of a few centimeters. It's almost miraculous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compared to drilling\nwells for monitoring groundwater aquifers, using InSAR data would be much\ncheaper and provide many more data points within a given area. Traditional\nmethods rely on wells that were not built with scientific data sampling in mind\nand their results can be inconsistent. The number of wells drilled into any\nparticular aquifer is much too small to be able to cover the entire groundwater\nsystem.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the amount of water\nin an aquifer goes up and down, specialized satellites can detect the movements\nof the land above the water system and hydrologists can use that information to\ninfer how much water lies below.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Previously, accurate elevation data could only\nbe acquired on barren lands such as deserts. Plants \u2013 especially growing crops,\nwhose heights change almost daily \u2013 create \"noise\" in data collected\nover time, reducing their quality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydrologists and regulatory\nbodies looking for more data to better understand their groundwater system should\nset policies requiring farmers to leave a patch of land clear for InSAR data\ncollection. This technique could be used in agricultural regions anywhere in\nthe world, even those that lack modern infrastructure such as wells.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">InSAR measurements have\nbeen made about once a month, around the entire globe, for decades. This gives\ngives researchers a four-dimensional picture of how the Earth has swelled and\nshrunk in the past 25 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wetland InSAR is a\nunique application of the interferometric synthetic aperture&nbsp; radar (InSAR) technique that detects\nelevation changes of aquatic surfaces. Most&nbsp;\nother InSAR applications detect displacements of solid surfaces .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ntechnique works because the radar pulse is backscattered twice (double bounce)\nfrom the water surface and vegetation. Wetland InSAR provides high spatial\nresolution hydrologic observations of wetlands and floodplains that cannot be\nobtained by any terrestrial-based methods.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/r_VC_iUbmUU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/r_VC_iUbmUU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">InSAR observations of wetlands have\nbeen acquired over various wetland environments using L-, C-, and X-bands and\ndifferent polarizations . L-band data are most suitable for the wetland InSAR\napplications. However, the X- and C-band radar signals, which primarily\ninteract only with the upper sections of the vegetation, were also found to be\nuseful.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In general, promising applications of InSAR for wetland observations\ninclude high spatial resolution water level monitoring, detection of flow\npatterns and flow discontinuities, and constraining high-resolution flow models<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To detect changes of\nwater level in wetlands, InSAR is being used. InSAR provides high spatial\nresolution hydrologic observations of wetlands and floodplains that cannot be\nobtained by any terrestrial-based methods.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fwSKMnWeZ1c/WRIXEFT70OI/AAAAAAABTKw/WSLkQuJZ_Jwj6LLHKhJWYgpMpngAMOYUACLcB/s1600/insarIlleustration.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fwSKMnWeZ1c/WRIXEFT70OI/AAAAAAABTKw/WSLkQuJZ_Jwj6LLHKhJWYgpMpngAMOYUACLcB/s400/insarIlleustration.png\" width=\"217\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satellites that use\nelectromagnetic waves to monitor changes in the elevation of Earth's surface to\nwithin a millimeter could be mined for clues about groundwater. The technology,\nInterferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR), had previously been used\nprimarily to collect data on volcanoes, earthquakes and landslides.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">InSAR data could play a vital role in\nmeasuring seasonal changes in groundwater supply and help determine levels for\nsustainable water use.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/g_N4GyvVe9E/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/g_N4GyvVe9E?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7252777642488833743\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_125M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html?showComment=1494330905981#c7252777642488833743\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 9, 2017 at 5:25 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_125MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Project_GreenHands</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS BLOGSITE WANTS TO KNOW WHO HAS ALLOWED SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TO PLANT 114 MILLION TREES</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE HAVE FOUND OUT WHAT TYPE OF TREES HE HAS PLANTED . ALL USELESS VARIETIES ( INEDIBLE ) WHICH DO NOTHING OTHER THAN SUCK UP GROUNDWATER BY TRANSPIRATION</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WHAT IS ISHA FOUNDATIONS EXPERTISE IN TRANSPIRATION ? &nbsp; &nbsp;IS THIS WHY THIS FELLOW SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV ( ENGLISH LITERATURE GURU ) WAS GIVEN PADMA VIBHUSHAN ?</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTranspiration is the process by which moisture is carried through plants from roots to small pores on the underside of leaves, where it changes to vapor and is released to the atmosphere.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTranspiration is essentially evaporation of water from plant leaves. Transpiration also includes a process called guttation, which is the loss of water in liquid form from the uninjured leaf or stem of the plant, principally through water stomata.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPlants put down roots into the soil to draw water.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSome of this water is returned to the air by transpiration (when combined with evaporation, the total process is known as evapotranspiration).</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTranspiration rates vary widely depending on weather conditions, such as temperature, humidity, sunlight availability and intensity, precipitation, soil type and saturation, wind, and land slope</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nDuring dry periods, transpiration can contribute to the loss of moisture in the upper soil zone, which can have an effect on vegetation and food-crop fields.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>TAMIL NADU IS NOT A PLACE TO PLANT USELESS TREES WHICH EVAPORATES THE WATER UNDER THE GROUND. UNDER THE GROUND , &nbsp;WATER IS NOT AFFECTED BY EVAPORATION .</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPlant transpiration is pretty much an invisible process, since the water is evaporating from the leaf surfaces, you don't just go out and see the leaves \"sweating\". Just because you can't see the water doesn't mean it is not being put into the air, though</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe amount of water that plants transpire varies greatly geographically and over time. There are a number of factors that determine transpiration rates:</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTemperature:Transpiration rates go up as the temperature goes up, especially during the growing season, when the air is warmer due to stronger sunlight and warmer air masses.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHigher temperatures cause the plant cells which control the openings (stoma) where water is released to the atmosphere to open, whereas colder temperatures cause the openings to close.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nRelative humidity: As the relative humidity of the air surrounding the plant rises the transpiration rate falls. It is easier for water to evaporate into dryer air than into more saturated air.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWind and air movement: Increased movement of the air around a plant will result in a higher transpiration rate. This is somewhat related to the relative humidity of the air, in that as water transpires from a leaf, the water saturates the air surrounding the leaf.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIf there is no wind, the air around the leaf may not move very much, raising the humidity of the air around the leaf. Wind will move the air around, with the result that the more saturated air close to the leaf is replaced by drier air.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSoil-moisture availability:</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen moisture is lacking, plants can begin to senesce (premature ageing, which can result in leaf loss) and transpire less water.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nType of plant: Plants transpire water at different rates. Some plants which grow in arid regions, such as cacti and succulents, conserve precious water by transpiring less water than other plants.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nin places where the water table is near the land surface, such as next to lakes and oceans, plant roots can penetrate into the saturated zone below the water table, allowing the plants to transpire water directly from the groundwater system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHere, transpiration of groundwater commonly results in a drawdown of the water table much like the effect of a pumped well (cone of depression).</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-I9Quiy72dpY/WRGu5XkkWJI/AAAAAAABTKc/iNja0Lu7IucKTH8DBlI5y96kCZ2BzYbowCLcB/s1600/ima99ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-I9Quiy72dpY/WRGu5XkkWJI/AAAAAAABTKc/iNja0Lu7IucKTH8DBlI5y96kCZ2BzYbowCLcB/s400/ima99ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/avZtD4gkM84/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/avZtD4gkM84?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/h77ytr5UzBY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/h77ytr5UzBY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using NASA\u2019s twin <span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">GRACE\n(Gravity Recovery and Climate Experiment) satellites</span></span>, the scientists measured\ntiny shifts in earth\u2019s gravity field to determine the rate of groundwater .\nThis technology has been used in India . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>Warning: &nbsp;&nbsp;DO NOT BLINDLY TRUST ANY WESTERN SATELLITE\nDATA.&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY WOULD LOVE TO PUT A SCARE INTO INDIA. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EVERY FOREIGN\nSATELLITE DATA MUST BE VERIFIED BY PHYSICAL MEASUREMENTS AT RANDOM</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/fKVPFyu_tHQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/fKVPFyu_tHQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gravity Recovery and\nClimate Experiment, ( GRACE ) relies on the interplay of two twin satellites\nthat monitor each other while orbiting the Earth, thereby producing &nbsp;precise data on the planet\u2019s gravitational\nvariations. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grace claims sees all\nof the change in ice, all of the change in snow and water storage, all of the\nsurface water, all of the soil moisture, all of the groundwater. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWater below the\nsurface can hide from the naked eye, but not from GRACE,\" says their advertisements&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The twin satellites of\nGRACE can sense tiny changes in Earth\u2019s gravity field and associated mass\ndistribution, including water masses stored above or below Earth\u2019s surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As\nthe satellites orbit 300 miles above Earth's surface, their positions change --\nrelative to each other -- in response to variations in the pull of gravity. The\nsatellites fly roughly 137 miles apart, and microwave ranging systems measure\nevery microscopic change in the distance between the two.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The twin\nsatellites of GRACE can sense tiny changes in Earth\u2019s gravity field and\nassociated mass distribution, including water masses stored above or below\nEarth\u2019s surface.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the satellites orbit 300 miles above Earth's surface, their\npositions change -- relative to each other -- in response to variations in the\npull of gravity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The satellites fly roughly 137 miles apart, and microwave\nranging systems measure every microscopic change in the distance between the\ntwo.<span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The GRACE map shows\ngroundwater changes in India during 2002-08, with losses in red and gains in\nblue, based on GRACE satellite observations.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The estimated rate of depletion of\ngroundwater in northwestern India is 4.0 centimeters of water per year,\nequivalent to a water table decline of 33 centimeters per year. We will take\nthis with a pinch of salt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like all NASA satellite\ndata, GRACE data are freely available for download from open NASA data centers\n(GRACE Tellus and the Physical Oceanography Distributed Active Archive Center)\nat NASA\u2019s Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, California.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pakistan has sent\nscientists to the University of Washington learning how to analyze and process\nthe GRACE data to enhance decision-making .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GRACE is a joint\npartnership between NASA in the United States and Deutsche Forschungsanstalt\nf\u00fcr Luft und Raumfahrt (DLR) in Germany.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GRACE has returned data\non some of the world\u2019s biggest aquifers and how their water storage is changing\n. Using estimates of changes in snow and surface soil moisture, scientists can\ncalculate an exact change in groundwater in volume over a given time period.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GRACE is the first tool\nthat is able to estimate from space how much water is \u201cmissing\u201d from aquifers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hydrologists analyzed\nsix years of monthly data for northern India from twin satellites called GRACE\n- NASA's Gravity Recovery and Climate Experiment - to produce a chronology of\nunderground water storage changes.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D7BAQAFV46E/WRIWxkcCa9I/AAAAAAABTKs/caIrIcN8jYwaQPxG03Z5grw6yjhxg95uACLcB/s1600/satellite-imagers-590MMx442.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-D7BAQAFV46E/WRIWxkcCa9I/AAAAAAABTKs/caIrIcN8jYwaQPxG03Z5grw6yjhxg95uACLcB/s640/satellite-imagers-590MMx442.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gravity Recovery\nand Climate Experiment (GRACE) mission, launched in 2002, consists of two identical\nsatellites orbiting in unison at the same altitude but with a separation of 220\nkm. The two satellites monitor the relative position of each other using\nmicrowave-ranging instruments.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they pass over a gravity anomaly, the leading\nspacecraft approaches and speeds up due to higher angular momentum. This causes\nthe two satellites to increase separation. After the first spacecraft passes\nthe anomaly, it slows down again; meanwhile the following satellite\naccelerates, then decelerates over the same point.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By recording satellite\nseparation, gravity is mapped; cycles of growing/shrinking separation indicate\nthe size and strength of the gravity anomalies,from which the quantity of groundwater\ncan be estimated</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to atmospheric\nvariability and observational errors, accurate estimates of water mass can only\nbe obtained for regions that are several hundreds of kilometers or more in\nscale . Thus, estimating water storage changes in large aquifer systems is feasible&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GRACE data are expressed\nin mm equivalent to water but with no distinction between snow cover, soil\nmoisture and deep ground water storage</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GRACE measures changes\nin the local pull of gravity as water shifts around Earth due to changing\nseasons, weather and climate processes.&nbsp; GRACE\ngave the first space-based view of water beneath Earth's surface, giving\ninsight into where aquifers may be shrinking or dry soils contributing to\ndrought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the twin\nsatellites of the U.S./German Gravity Recovery and Climate Experiment launched\non March 17, 2002, their data have transformed scientists' view of how water\nmoves and is stored around the planet. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spaceborne remote\nsensing: tracking the movement of water via its mass, measuring mass gives you\na way to probe the Earth system, Measuring changes in mass has been a key to\ndiscovering how water and the solid Earth are changing in places humans can't go\nor can't see.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Areas in red had\nslightly less mass due to a net loss of groundwater and therefore exhibited a\nweaker gravitational pull on the orbiting satellites.&nbsp; Blue showed where the water level has not\ndeclined.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gravity Recovery\nand Climate Experiment (GRACE) satellites showed that many of the world\u2019s\nbiggest aquifers are being depleted at a much faster rate than they can be\nreplenished.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satellite-collected\ndata can accurately measure aquifer levels, a the use of satellites to\naccurately measure levels of water stored hundreds of feet below ground.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A large swath of\nextremely high surface water stress covers northwestern India. With limited surface\nwater, it\u2019s no surprise that the region\u2019s farmers are withdrawing groundwater\nmore quickly than anywhere else on Earth, making the water situation even more\nprecarious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GRACE data can help\nscientists monitor where the water is and how it changes over time. It's\nfundamentally difficult to do this monitoring in a conventional way -- sending\npeople and sticking probes in the ground to measure water. It takes a long time\nand it's expensive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BUT THEN IN INDIA, WE WILL NOT PLACE 100% TRUST ON SATELLITES-- ESPECIALLY WESTERN SATELLITES .</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BOREWELL WATER IN BANGALORE AREA IS HARD AND GIVES KIDNEY\nSTONES. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">YET NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE ABOUT IT.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">KIDNEY HOSPITALS SING ALL THE WAY TO THE BANK.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">GALL BLADDERS ARE SURGICALLY REMOVED AND THROWN AWAY LIKE CUT\nFINGER NAILS.</b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the gall bladder is\nremoved by surgery ( unwanted ) the human body cannot digest fats properly for\nthe rest of the life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gallbladder serves\nas a bridge between the liver (which produces bile necessary for the digestion\nof fats) and the small intestine, where the digestion occurs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gallbladder\nstores the bile and parcels it out as needed. If the bladder is removed, it\ndoesn't impair the production of needed bile, only its concentration and timed\nrelease into the small intestine. Dilute bile merely oozes in continually.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have\ngallbladder surgery \u2013 you go from just being deficient in the fat soluble\nvitamins (A,D,E,K) and essential fatty acids to being potentially deficient in\nmost of the major vitamin categories.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To compound matters, they typically put\nyou on a significant dose of antibiotics after your surgery \u2013 which kills off\nthe good bacteria in your gut along with the bad, and since 85% of you immune\nfunction comes from the gut and those good bacteria, your immune function goes\ndown , making your MORE tired and susceptible to catching everything that goes\naround.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body uses\ncholesterol and vitamin D&nbsp; as precursors\nto make many of your hormones, including your sex hormones.&nbsp; Fats are necessary for life, and your brain\nis largely a fatty organ.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why\npeople taking anti-cholesterol medications (statins) frequently experience\ndecreased libido, or even sexual dysfunction.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThey also often experience short term memory issues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/cholesterol-lowering-drugs-with-side.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/cholesterol-lowering-drugs-with-side.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WE ASK THE MODI GOVT TO\nPROFILE HOSPITALS AND SURGEONS ( SLAVES OF EVIL PHARMA ) &nbsp;WHO DO EXCESSIVE GALL BLADDER REMOVAL IN A CRIMINAL MANNER --JUST TO MAKE MONEY&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6200 YER OLD AYURVEDA KNOWS\nTHE IMPORTANCE OF GALL BLADDER AND BILE ( PITHA ).</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gallbladder acts as\na reservoir for bile where it is &nbsp;concentrated, up to 18 times.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is this highly concentrated bile that is\ndesigned to break down the fatty acids and fat soluble vitamins you\nconsume.&nbsp; The pre-concentrated bile,\nwhile caustic and irritating to your gastric mucosa, can\u2019t hold a candle to the\nconcentrated bile your gallbladder should hold.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is never enough, and never enough at\nthe specific concentration required to absorb those key nutrients out of your\ndiet.&nbsp; So you become deficient and your\nbody goes into conservation mode. Gas, bloating, and diarrhea are the most\ncommonly experienced repercussions from having cholecystectomy.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/B1AVxzccS5Q/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/B1AVxzccS5Q?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK THE GOVT TO PROVIDE FREE TESTING OF WATER ( CHEMICAL AND BIOLOGICAL ANALYSIS ) -- &nbsp;MAKING THE DISTRICT COLLECTOR RESPONSIBLE FOR TRANSPARENCY AND EFFICIENCY</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/sF45_sYve7s/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/sF45_sYve7s?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE BRAIN POWER OF AMERICANS WAS BROUGHT DOWN DRASTICALLY BY FLUORIDE IN WATER-- &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">-ADDED DELIBERATELY INTO MUNICIPAL&nbsp;TAP WATER , CALCIFYING THEIR PINEAL GLANDS&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/olKpWmdSfLs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/olKpWmdSfLs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">CULPRITS HAVE NOT BEEN IDENTIFIED AND PUNISHED </b><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/pineal-gland-third-eye-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">&nbsp;http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/pineal-gland-third-eye-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_159M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html?showComment=1494389637422#c4617220279577880775\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 10, 2017 at 9:43 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_159MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY TOLD ME --<br />\n<br />\nCAPTAIN, DEADLY REVELATIONS IN THIS POST ABOUT GROUNDWATER<br />\n<br />\nTHEN HE ASKED -- CAPTAIN , WHY DID YOU STOP YOUR DEADLY \" NAIVE SAILOR SERIES ?\"<br />\n<br />\nI REPLIED \" I DID NOT ALLOW MY ELDER SON TO ENTER MY PROFESSION AS SEA IS A PLACE FOR FOOLS \"<br />\n<br />\nIF I CONTINUE MY \"NAIVE SAILOR \" SERIES -I WILL BE DOING GREAT DIS-SERVICE TO THE SEA , WHICH TOOK CARE OF ME FOR 40 YEARS .<br />\n<br />\nHE WANTED TWO EXAMPLES ?<br />\n<br />\nI SAID , I WILL GIVE SOME INFO ABOUT SHORE TEACHING. OUR CERTIFICATES EXPIRE REGULARLY AND WE HAVE TO GO FOR \"REVALIDATION \" .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MEANS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WILL HAVE TO LISTEN TO A TEACHER WHO IS SO FUCKIN' STUPID THAT I WONT EVEN SHIT ON HIS FACE \".<br />\n<br />\nHE EXPOSTULATED -- OH CAPTAIN, HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE ?. I DONT BELIEVE YOU !<br />\n<br />\nWOOOKAY --JUST TWO<br />\n<br />\n#####<br />\n<br />\nAAA ) EXAMPLE NO 1 :<br />\n<br />\nA SHIP CAPTAIN WITH MORE THAN 15 YEARS EXPERIENCE WAS TEACHING THE SUBJECT OF \"SQUAT \" WITH MORE THAN 30 CAPTAINS IN THE CLASS .<br />\n<br />\nAFTER HE FINISHED HIS 60 MINUTE LECTURE I GOT UP AND ASKED HIM \" SIR, HAVE YOU FINISHED ?\"<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM &nbsp; &nbsp;\"WHAT YOU TAUGHT TILL NOW HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SQUAT \"<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS STUNNED SILENCE IN THE CLASS. THE MAN KNEW ME AS \"<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VADAKAYIL - THE LIVING LEGEND AT SEA</span></b>\"<br />\n<br />\nMY SENIOR SITTING EXT TO ME PINCHED ME AND WHISPERED \" AJIT, YOU SHOULD NOT HAVE DISGRACED HIM THIS WAY- &nbsp; &nbsp;HE WILL NOW LOSE HIS JOB AND HE DOES NOT APPEAR TO FINANCIALLY BE WELL HEELED \"<br />\n<br />\nTHIS EXACTLY IS INDIAs PROBLEM.. WE ALLOW PRETENDERS --NAY FOOLS --TO OPERATE AS TEACHERS FOR DECADES --WE ARE TOO SENTIMENTAL.<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN AFTER COFFEE BREAK I TOLD A FEW THINGS TO THE CLASS WITH THE TEACHER LISTENING. THE BLOGPOST BELOW IS A REFLECTION OF WHAT I TOLD THAT HOUR<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/ships-squat-bernoulli-and-under-keel.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nBBB ) I WENT FOR AN ARPA COURSE.( AUTOMATIC RADAR PLOTTING AIDS )<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS A TWO DAY COURSE , WITH A INDIAN NAVY EX-CAPTAIN TEACHING<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THE FIRST 30 MINUTES--I FOUND THE COURSE WAS A TOTAL FARCE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE RADARS WERE NO ACTIVATED AS THE INSTITUTION HAD NOT PAID FOR THE PACKAGE . THEY DID NOT EVEN KNOW IT.<br />\n<br />\nONCE YOU PAY AND INSERT THE CD WITH A PASSWORD --THE SIMULATOR SYSTEM SPRINGS ALIVE WITH COLORED CHARTS ( FROM DULL GREY AND WHITE )<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD THE TEACHER-- \"YOUR INSTITUTION HAS TO PAY AND ACTIVATE THE PACKAGE --OR YOU ARE JUST GOING THROUGH THE MOTIONS--TOTAL BULLSHIT-- YOU ARE RIDICULING YOUR STUDENTS BECAUSE THEY CRASHED INTO THE QUAY-- BUT HEY, YOU ARE WORSE THAN THE STUDENTS.. THE NUMBER ON THE RADAR CHART ARE NOT SOUNDINGS -- BUT GRID NUMBERS TO BE ACTIVATED \"<br />\n<br />\nI WALKED OUT-- AND TILL I RETIRED I DID NOT HAVE AN ARPA CERTIFICATE .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://msi.nga.mil/MSISiteContent/StaticFiles/NAV_PUBS/RNM/310ch5.pdf</span><br />\n<br />\nMANY TIME EMPLOYERS SAID \"WE CANT EMPLOY YOU AS YOU DONT HAVE AN ARPA CERTIFICATE \"<br />\n<br />\nTO THEM I SAID \" READ THE RULES AGAIN--HERE IS A COPY---I HAVE RADAR SIMULATOR COURSE CERTIFICATE WITH ME \"<br />\n<br />\nI AM USED TO DEALING WITH MINDLESS CUNTS<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-radar-anti-collision-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSHIPS AVOIDED COLLISION BY GODs GRACE NOT HUMAN COMPETENCE. WHEN A NAVIGATOR NAVIGATES ON \"TRUE VECTOR \" OR \"TRUE TRAILS \" MODE-- YOU KNOW HE IS A CUNT. ALL JAPANESE PILOTS NAVIGATE IN FOG IN HEAVY TRAFFIC IN \"TRUE VECTOR MODE\" .. THEY GET HIGHLY STRESSED.<br />\n<br />\nNOW --<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE GIVEN THREE SHOCKING EXAMPLES WHY I DID NOT ALLOW MY ELDER SON TO COME OUT TO SEA<br />\n<br />\nHE WOULD BE A CHAMPION BREED RACE HORSE-- BETWEEN MAD DONKEYS , AD BEING PUNISHED FOR HAVING AN \"ATTITUDE PROBLEM \" --THOUGH HE IS AN EPITOME OF HUMILITY ..<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS AN INCIDENT ABOUT \"RAT GUARDS \" WHEN HE SAILED WITH ME AS A CHILD<br />\n<br />\nRAT GUARDS STILL FALL OF TODAY, IN THE YEAR 2017.<br />\n<br />\nGO TO ANY HARBOUR ANYWHERE ON THE PLANET --YOU WILL FIND THAT THE SHIP WHICH IS BERTHED HAS RAT GUARDS WHICH HAVE FALLEN OFF.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/snow-shovelling-and-backache-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4695899535684751300\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_161M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 31, 2012 at 12:40 PM<br />\nhi bhoj,<br />\n<br />\nAAA ) dont believe these re-validation gurus too much.<br />\n<br />\nmost of them are unfit at sea--and in the class room.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">for example when i did my re-validation the SBT lecturer , a proper ex-chief engineer was goin' on and on about FILTER FEEDING FISH, how they feed on the sea suction filters etc.<br /><br />then i had to stop him and tell him that this </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>FILTER belongs to the fish's body and NOT on the ship's hull.</b></span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">this relates more to RED TIDE where shell fishes ( mollusca ) entrap toxins in their gill filters.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<br />\nfor example a lot of US marines died in the strait of magellan as they had a barbecue with such fish ( SEVERE ALLERGY--SLAMMING OF EPIGLOTIS ) .<br />\n<br />\neven in kerala in extreme summer we in kerala do NOT eat shell fish-- as when sea water has the right temperature the algae or phythoplanktons , over blooms and toxins get entrapped in the gills ( filter )of shell fish.<br />\n<br />\nyou can read about RED TIDE in wikipedia.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/12/segregated-ballast-and-ballast-exchange.html</span><br />\n<br />\ni had one ex-master ( senior one ) giving bull about ship's SQUAT-- till i got up and told him that squat is related to UKC, ( UNDER KEEL CLEARANCE ) and not what he is alluding to.<br />\n<br />\nor a VERY senior ex-master giving bull about ship's having collision in open sea due to magnetic effect of ship's hull. i got up and told him that this is NOT possible-- unless you are dreaming.<br />\n<br />\nafter 5 years he was giving the same bull, when i went for my next re-validation. this time i went to the dean and told him -- if the re-validation is NOT a money making racket--please -- have proper teachers-- or atleast techers who are willing to be corrected from sailors who know better.<br />\n<br />\nBBB) yes-- for example , as you can see sulphuric acid is reactive with almost everything -- so on parcel tankers we do NOT allow non-compatible chemical contact even inside the manifold drip tray.<br />\n<br />\na mixture of sulphuric acid and salt water entrapped in a pipeline can make a hole in the pipeline ( weld seams ) within 48 hours.<br />\n<br />\nthis is the reason why annex 2 overboards on sulphuric acid carriers usually get holes on the length between the UW overboard and the level of the sea surface.<br />\n<br />\nit should be possible to blank this length from the inboard part of the annex 2 overboard--for on board repairs.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_179M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAVE YOU NOT DONE ANYTHING IN YOUR POWER TO MAKE SURE STUPID CUNT TEACHERS OF MARITIME INSTITUTIONS ASHORE ARE SACKED<br />\n<br />\nWOOKAY<br />\n<br />\nI WILL GIVE JUST ONE EXAMPLE<br />\n<br />\n############<br />\n<br />\nI WAS ATTENDING A COURSE IN MUMBAI<br />\n<br />\nTHE TEACHER WAS POOR IN ENGLISH -- A SHORT DARK UGLY CHARACTER --BUT VERY AGGRESSIVE<br />\n<br />\nHE STARTED OFF HIS FIRST CLASS WITH \"IF I FIND THAT YOU ARE NOT PAYING ATTENTION , I WILL SEND YOU OUT OF THE CLASS AND THEN YOU WONT GET YOUR CERTIFICATE \"<br />\n<br />\nHE WOULD TALK LIKE THIS \" I SAAYYY YOU MY FREIENNADS \"<br />\n<br />\nDURING COFFEE BREAK I WENT TO SEE THE DEAN<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I ENTERED HIS ROOM I FOUND THAT I WAS HIS CHIEF OFFICER ON A TANKER --<br />\n<br />\nHE WOULD GO ASHORE WITH HIS WIFE IN EVERY PORT , TELLING ALL --WHEN I HAVE A COMPETENT CHIEF OFFICER LIKE THIS, WHY SHOULD I BE ON BOARD\"<br />\n<br />\nWE TALKED OF OLD TIMES -- HE WAS INDEBTED AND MOST GRATEFUL TO ME AS WHEN THE SHIP WAS GOING TO THE WAR ZONE ( IRAN/ IRAQ ) , HIS NEWLY MARRIED WIFE SIGNED OFF WITH ME AND I ESCORTED HER HOME<br />\n<br />\nTHEN HE ASKED ME WHY I CAME<br />\n<br />\nI SAID, I CAME TO SEE THE DEAN --NOT YOUR PERSONALLY<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD HIM : \" THAT TEACHER IS NOT FIT TO TEACH EVEN FRESH SEAMEN --LEAVE ALONE SENIOR CAPTAINS \"<br />\n<br />\nHE REPLIED----- \"AJIT WHAT CAN I DO. HE IS AN INDIAN NAVY PETTY OFFICER FROM SC/ST QUOTA--THE SON-IN-LAW OF THE CONGRESS GOVT. &nbsp; &nbsp; WHEN THE REGULAR TEACHER ( A CAPTAIN WHOM WE BOTH KNEW ) HAD TO GO HOME IN AN EMERGENCY, THIS USELESS FELLOW , VOLUNTEERED JUST TO SHOW THE PRACTICAL ASPECTS OF FILLING FIRE EXTINGUISHERS .. WHEN THE REGULAR TEACHER CAPTAIN CAME BACK, HE REFUSED TO QUIT AND THREATENED TO TAKE THE MATTER TO THE DALIT COMMISSION --AND FOR THIS HE HAS POLITICAL MARATHA MANOOS SUPPORT -- THEY THREATENED TO PUT ME INTO JAIL \"<br />\n<br />\nHE SAID HE HAS PUT HIS RESIGNATION PAPERS AND IS JUST DOING THE TRANSITION PERIOD<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE CONDITION OF INDIA !<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST HAVE HOSPITALS FOR BRAIN SURGERY ALL OVER INDIA.. &nbsp; &nbsp;WITH ONLY SC/ ST QUOTA SURGEONS AND NURSES .. &nbsp; &nbsp;THIS SYSTEM MUST BE FREE FOR SC/ ST PEOPLE. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; LET US SEE HOW MANY DALITS MAKE USE OF THIS FREE SURGERY ON THEMSELVES OR THEIR CHILDREN \"<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4937622936687755020\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_122M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IT WAS EASY TO STEAL IDEAS AND PATENT IT.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY IN THE YEAR 2017 , SOME OLD GAS CARRIERS WHOSE MACHINERY CANNOT COOL DOWN DUE TO WEAR AND TEAR-- THE CHIEF ENGINEER JUST CANT DELIVER LOW TEMPERATURES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE CAPTAIN BOILS OFF THE CARGO ( LIQUIFIED GAS ) JUST BEFORE ARRIVAL PORT TO COOL IT DOWN INSTANTLY TO MINUS 108 DEG CENTIGRADE -- AND THEN THEY FUDGE THE TANK PRESSURE MEASURING EQUIPMENT TO PREVENT DETECTION OF LOST ( INTO AIR ) CARGO .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; \"?<br />\n<br />\nINITIALLY HE SAID NO.<br />\n<br />\nTHEN I CLAPPED ON TO THE FILIPINO ENGINE OILER-- \" THEN IT MUST BE YOU, FOR ONLY YOU BOTH ARE HERE&nbsp;\"<br />\n<br />\nHE CRIED &nbsp;\"SIR, THE CHIEF JUST OPENED ALL 4 CYLINDER COCKS , IN FRONT OF ME \"<br />\n<br />\nI HISSED AT THE CHIEF ENGINEER \" YOU CUNT --COME TO MY CABIN NOW \"<br />\n<br />\nI CLOSED THE DOOR AND THEN HE KNOWS WHAT WILL HAPPEN--EITHER I WILL BLEED HIM OR SEND HIM HOME AT THE NEXT PORT<br />\n<br />\nHE CRIES \" THE ACETYLENE IS CONTAMINATED -THIS IS NOT THE SMELL OF ACETYLENE \"<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MADE ME MORE ANGRY<br />\n<br />\nTO CUT A LONG STORY SHORT-- HE APOLOGIZED AND ADMITTED IGNORANCE<br />\n<br />\nI HAD TO SEND THE ACETYLENE CYLINDERS BACK-- AS THE STABILISER ACETONE WAS SPENT<br />\n<br />\n##########<br />\n<br />\nSOME TECHNICAL DETAILS --ALMOST 99% CHIEF ENGINEERS ARE IGNORANT OF WHAT FOLLOWS<br />\n<br />\n###########<br />\nAcetylene bottle --Filling pressure 15 bars \u2014 cutting / welding working pressures 0.3 bars<br />\n<br />\nOxygen 150 bars \u2013 cutting working pressure 4 kg , welding working pressure 0.2 bars<br />\n<br />\nMax pressure regulator outlet for Acetylene 0.8 kg -- Oxygen 8 kg<br />\n<br />\nLiquid Acetone as a stabilizer\u2014garlic ethereal odour. Porous mass which soaks acetone occupies 92% of the cylinder. In a 40 litre cylinder 13.6 kg is acetone<br />\n<br />\nOpen acetylene cylinder valve ( like the CUNT chief engineer ) without torch \u2014 spit out acetone -- fire danger<br />\n<br />\nAcetylene gas not used at greater than 1/7 of cylinder capacity<br />\n<br />\nKept acetylene cylinder always upright<br />\n<br />\n4 Acetylene cylinders \u2013 8 oxygen cylinders ( ratio of consumption 1:2)<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6103124675398278913\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_157M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
