font-size: large;\"><b><br />Dilip is the co founder of and Consulting Partner for Perfect Relations, established in the early 90\u2019s</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Pneumococcal disease is\na broad term referring to a number of different infections ranging from a mild\near infection to deadly infections of the brain (meningitis) and blood stream.\nStreptococcus pneumonia, the cause of these infections, is also the most common\ncause of lung diseases among adults over the age of 65.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting previous flu\nshots led to a blunting effect or \"interference\" that left the\nrecipient less protected from certain influenza strains in later years</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Research presented at\nthe 105th International Conference of the American Thoracic Society in San\nDiego revealed that children who had gotten seasonal flu shots were more at\nrisk for hospitalization from H1N1 pandemic influenza than children who had not\ngotten previous flu shots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children who had\nreceived the influenza vaccinations had three times the risk of hospitalization\nfor H1N1pandemic influenza as children who were not vaccinated. Among children\nwith asthma, the risk was even higher.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you're naturally\ninfected with influenza, your body will build antibodies that may fight off\nother influenza strains that circulate in future years. Flu vaccine, however,\nwill only protect you against the type A or type B influenza strains it\ncontains and artificial vaccine acquired immunity is not identical to naturally\nacquired immunity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So it's possible that people who didn't get influenza A\ninfection prior to 2009, were therefore more susceptible to the influenza A\npandemic virus.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is mounting\nevidence that flu shots cause Alzheimer\u2019s disease.&nbsp; People who received the flu vaccine each year\nfor 3 to 5 years had a 10-fold greater chance of developing Alzheimer\u2019s disease\nthan people who did not have any flu shots.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also with age the immune system weakens, thus lowering your ability to\nfight off infections. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very people pushing\nthese vaccines stand to make billions of dollars.&nbsp; This itself creates a doubt on how effective\nthese flu vaccines really are?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; We have vadic humped cow at my home. We used to have only that ghee for daily use.Earlier used to have buffaloes at home. Since I am a old reader of you. I make my parents to switch to vedic humped cow only and they are happy. Our cow milk and ghee is in lot of demand for medical purposes. Even my cousin used to have cow urine in the morning.<br />\nAll this happened because of your teachings sir. Very much thankful to you.
